Please do note however, Tsuki will not portray herself nude and will only work with what she is comfortable with. Please respect her decision if she denies your request! You will be able to have a discussion with the photographer and Tsuki herself so lets make this work! :D
 

The Impact
Prints have gone a long way since paper was invented. With the advance of technology, books, magazines and photo cards has been depreciated. However there is this attraction of prints that seem to attract people who continue to purchase them. The ability to touch and feel the actual paper is different than looking at it from the computer screen. 
With the success of this project, we hope to also give you this experience outside of Singapore! 
It would also be extremely encouraging for Tsuki as she has a strong passion to develop bigger projects and more concept shoots that she could be proud of, and hoping even more she can reach out to people that she can share her achievements with.This project would help her fund her daily allowance and future endeavours as well!
Goals
500 USD - The minimal amount needed to print the books. Everyone who backed $2 or more will receive an extra photo card! 
700 USD - A great step ahead! We would have never expected this! More Photocards (3 more) will be given to those who backed $10 or more! Kudos to everyone! ( in addition to the photo cards )
1000 USD - A leap towards the miracle! We would have never imagined! Thank you everyone!! Extra 10 pages with another set of costume will be added into the photo book! WE ARE CRYING LITERALLY!!! ( in addition to the charms and photo cards )
 

Risks & Challenges
Kyudotsg have been involved in several photo book before therefore the possibility of this project failing is out of the question. The quality of the photos is also assured as you can see from the few photos displayed here that will be included in the shoot. We will also be working with a printing shop that we frequent often with excellent quality. 
Here are some of the things to expect when you receive the photo books / cards
Paper - Premium Silk180 gsm
Package - Bubble wrapped in an envelope
Delivery - Registered article with tracking
 
Contact and Relevant Information
For more information you can contact us here at indiegogo or www.facebook.com/kyudotsg. 
For more photos of the previous works Kyudotsg has worked in you can view them here at www.kyudotsg.com
Find out more about Tsuki on her facebook page!
 https://www.facebook.com/rflectionsecrets/

story:
Farmers' Markets from Coast to Coast is a Road Trip which concentrates on what makes a great farmers' market and illustrates it through photography.

Who we are:

In October of 2010 we (Jessa and Dan Koppenhofer) decided to start a farmers' market in Gilbert, Arizona with our mission focusing around local sustainability, healthy eating and green living practices among our town and the surrounding area. Since that day we have always searched for ways to improve our market and to get back to those grassroots which made a farmers' market the gathering place of the entire community. After our first successful year open, we came to the conclusion that books and documentaries can only take us so far and that a Road Trip was the next step in finding the answers which we are seeking.

What is the Goal of this Road Trip?

Our initial goal is to study the differences between the markets; location, layout, booth setups, traffic, etc... and plan to apply some of the findings into our market in hopes of improving our market for our community. By improving our market we can improve others in the future. 

The long term goal is to create a picture book and a farmers’ market guide for costumers, vendors and coordinators in order to bridge the gap between markets and establish the farmers’ market in its rightful place as the gathering place of the community.

We plan to accomplish this by showing the public the beauty and lifestyle of the market, which is not just a ‘local thing’ but truly a reborn movement from coast to coast.

Yes, farmers’ markets are the essence of being local, or at least they should be, but it is our believe that it can be much more than that. As a good friend ones told me, “Farmers’ markets are the travelers best friend. Not only do you get fresh produce while on the road, you get to taste the local flavors and experience the local culture as well”.*

Think this trip is a vacation? Think again! To visit the 50 plus markets on our list, it will take us 67 days with an average of 4 to 5 hours drive per day! Between exploring the markets, driving and catching some shut eye in between, there is no relaxing on this trip.

Why 67 Days and what markets?

The reason for 67 days is to make the trip work for all the markets we plan to visit and feature in the Photo Book. With certain markets being open only on a specific day of the week, it makes planning this trip quite difficult. 

Our Road Trip Schedule is still a work in progress until the day we leave! If you have any suggestions, please send us a message.

Viewing our current schedule should explain it all: Road Trip Schedule

What will you be taking pictures of?

We will be taking a plethora of pictures of anything our eyes are drawn to! We are not only looking for a beautiful picture at a market but also looking for the differences between markets and those interesting ideas which differentiate a market from the next. The pictures in the video are just some examples of what we plan to capture.

What are the funds for?

With your help, we will be able to travel from coast to coast and visit over 50 markets which we plan to include in our market research and future books.

    • Gasoline: $3,000 (12,000 miles at 4.25/Gallon) 
    • Lodging: $4,020 (67 nights at $60/night)
    • Fulfillment/Rewards: $3,500 (about 20% of project)
    • Project Costs: $1,500 (Indiegogo/CC'd Transactions)
    • Professional Photo Book Assembly: $500 
    • Farmers' Market Book Draft: $3,999 (Schiel & Denver)
    • On Road Emergencies: $1,000
    • Food/Personal Expenses: $0 (out of pocket costs)
    • Photography Accessories/Storage Drives: $0 (out of pocket costs)

      Total: 17,519.00
      Indiegogo Goal: 17,499.00

Why iPhone Photography?

Both of us have been taking pictures for a long time, Jessa even was a Freelance Photographer with her Canon Rebel XT but with todays technology we have become more comfortable with the amazing camera inside the iPhone4S. With some of the greatest apps (and an external lens or two) this phone can take some of the most stunning pictures.

Are you any good with an iPhone?

We'd like to believe we know our way around a camera but we will let you be the judge of some of our pictures:


For more examples, Sample Gallery

The Rewards:

First off, thank you for even spending the time to watch our video and to read through all of this and please remember, any amount will help!

While we cannot offer a final copy of the Farmers’ Market Book, which is the long term goal of this trip, we can offer some rewards including the notes from the trip and even a a first copy of the Picture Book.

By pledging $5: Be listed as a Supporter of our great Adventure on our website!

By pledging $10: Be listed as a Supporter on our website AND get exclusive 'On the Road Behind the Scenes Access' which means you will be able to follow us along the way! Thats right, you will be able to see our location via GPS, be the first to see some of the pics of the trip and read our messages, comments and blog while we are on the road. We will also be doing some video commentary while on the road and at the markets!

By pledging $25 Be listed as a Supporter on our website, 'On the Road Behind the Scenes Access' AND receive a ebook copy of our Road Trip Picture Book. This virtual picture book will feature all of the great pictures taken while on the road, at the markets and what ever else we happen to focus our lenses on.

By pledging $50  Be listed as a Supporter on our website, 'On the Road Behind the Scenes Access', ebook copy of our 'Road Trip Picture Book' AND a ebook copy of our Farmers Markets Notes from the trip. These notes will include all of the interesting and not so interesting discoveries we will find along the way. Differences between the markets, great ideas, unique setups and all of the little 'wow' factors we hope to encounter. PLUS three (3) 5X7 pictures of your choosing, mailed to you. After the trip is done and we get to load all the pictures onto our server. You will get exclusive first access to see all of the pictures of the trip, at this time, you will be able to choose the three pictures you'd like for your home or office.

By pledging $75 Be listed as a Supporter on our website, 'On the road Behind the Scenes Access', ebook copy of our 'Road Trip Picture Book', ebook copy of our Farmers Markets Notes, three 5X7 pictures AND three (3) 8X10 pictures of your choosing, mailed to you. At the same time you choose your 5X7 prints, you will be able to select three 8X10 pictures as well.

By pledging $125  Be listed as a Supporter on our website, 'On the road Behind the Scenes Access', ebook copy of our 'Road Trip Picture Book', ebook copy of our Farmers Markets Notes, three 5X7 pictures AND a printed copy of our Softcover 10X8 Picture Book. This picture book will be filled with the greatest pictures and stories from the trip.

By pledging $150 Be listed as a Supporter on our website, 'On the road Behind the Scenes Access', ebook copy of our 'Road Trip Picture Book', ebook copy of our Farmers Markets Notes, three 5X7 pictures, three 8X10 Picture Prints AND a printed copy of our Softcover 10X8 Picture Book.

By pledging $250 Be listed as a SPONSOR on our website, 'On the road Behind the Scenes Access', ebook copy of our 'Road Trip Picture Book', ebook copy of our Farmers Markets Notes, three 5X7 pictures, three 8X10 Picture Prints AND a Limited Edition Sponsors Picture Book. This picture book not only features a hardcover but it will also feature your name on the hardcover as a Sponsor! 

By pledging $500 Be listed as a SPONSOR on our website, 'On the road Behind the Scenes Access', ebook copy of our 'Road Trip Picture Book', ebook copy of our Farmers Markets Notes, three 5X7 pictures, three 8X10 Picture Prints, Limited Edition Sponsors Picture Book AND one (1) 20X30 Canvas Print of your choosing. When the time comes of choosing your six picture prints, you will also be asked to choose which picture you'd like as the Canvas Print.

By pledging $700 Be listed as a SPONSOR on our website, 'On the road Behind the Scenes Access', ebook copy of our 'Road Trip Picture Book', ebook copy of our Farmers Markets Notes, three 5X7 pictures, three 8X10 Picture Prints, Limited Edition Sponsors Picture Book AND a West Coast Sample Package shipped right to your door! This Package will be filled with some of the greatest treats and things we've found at the farmers markets along the West Coast. The West Coast Package will be from Colorado's East Boarder to the Pacific Coast.(We will do our best to stick to non-perishable food items but may substitute up to 10% with craft.)(Package not to exceed 70lbs. This price is only available for US Sponsors)

By pledging $1,000 Be listed as a SPONSOR on our website, 'On the road Behind the Scenes Access', ebook copy of our 'Road Trip Picture Book', ebook copy of our Farmers Markets Notes, three 5X7 pictures, three 8X10 Picture Prints, Limited Edition Sponsors Picture Book AND a East Coast Sample Package shipped right to your door! This Package will be filled with some of the greatest treats and things we've found at the farmers markets along the East Coast. The East Coast Package will be from Kansas City to the Atlantic Coast. (We will do our best to stick to non-perishable food items but may substitute up to 10% with craft.)(Package not to exceed 70lbs. This price is only available for US Sponsors)

By pledging $1,500 Be listed as a SPONSOR on our website, 'On the road Behind the Scenes Access', ebook copy of our 'Road Trip Picture Book', ebook copy of our Farmers Markets Notes, three 5X7 pictures, three 8X10 Picture Prints, Limited Edition Sponsors Picture Book AND a Coast to Coast Sample Package! This is the grand prize since you get to sample some of the greatest treats and things from all over the US! Just think, a package full of what America's Farmers Markets have to offer! (We will do our best to stick to non-perishable food items but may substitute up to 10% with craft.)(Package not to exceed 100lbs. This price is only available for US Sponsors)

THANK YOU!

Thank you for looking at our Project and considering being a backer!

Thank you to Bears of Manitou for letting us use one of their songs in our video.

Thank you to Bob Roman who did the wonderful Chalk Art for us!

*Quote from Zach Berning, Owner of Overland Gourmet

story:
Story

BEACH LOVERS: THE BOOK

I am raising money to produce and publish my first photo book, Beach Lovers. This book is my love letter to, for and about summer in NYC and to all New Yorkers. 

Beach Lovers is a series about love and intimacy between couples at the beaches of NYC, focusing on the Rockaways, Fort Tilden and Coney Island.  I have spent the last six years photographing beach-goers and the intimate gestures of couples around me; some tender, rubbing sunscreen on a partner's back; others lustful, a deep kiss in the water. There is something mesmerizing about escaping from the gritty, heaving metropolis that gets so hot in the summer, to sit on such a beautiful coastline. Just a few miles away from sticky sidewalks are sandy beaches and lazy ocean waves, and couples in love. Being on the beach emboldens couples to enjoy more affectionate freedom, their inhibitions less hidden than anywhere else I've observed in the city. I capture these tender moments that would otherwise be lost or overlooked. New York is home to a one-of-a-kind beach culture – diverse, time-limited and low-profile. It’s a place that has always inspired me to pick up my camera.

THE BOOK

Set to publish in Fall 2021, 'Beach Lovers' is a hardcover photography book about the universality of couples in love, and the story of NYC'S uniquely gritty yet romantic beaches. The medium-sized coffee table book will feature approximately 50 images, as diverse as the couples in them, at roughly 90-100 pages.  Your pledges will go towards making my first photo book dream a reality. ALL funds raised will go to covering book production costs, including design, printing, and shipping.

 

THE PHOTOGRAPHER

Sharon Hughes is a Brooklyn-based freelance photographer, 15 years a New Yorker, and is from Montreal, Canada. She is drawn to the ocean and her personal work is a reflection of that.  Sharon is fascinated by the juxtaposition of beach culture and landscape in the midst of NYC’s urban chaos. She is passionate about climate justice, ocean health and plastic consumption reduction. Select Beach Lovers prints are held in permanent collection and display at The Rockaway Hotel, in Queens, NYC. The series has been featured in numerous publications, including C-41, Ain’t Bad, Feature Shoot, Medium, Lomography,  La Repubblica Italy, Women in Street, and Flavorwire. The Beach Lovers photo ‘The Couple Next Door’ was a winning image in the 2020 Women Street Photographers’ Exhibition, and was exhibited in December 2020 Artspace PS 109. The series has also been exhibited at Ground Floor Gallery in Brooklyn, at Picture Farm Gallery in Brooklyn, and Studio Galerie B & B in Paris France. When she is not swimming or shooting photographs, Sharon spends her time taking care of her many plants and her two cats.

 

Risks and challenges

Publishing a premium hardcover coffee table book is a big investment. As an independent artist working on my own, I don't quite have all the funds needed to make this happen, yet I can’t afford NOT to publish this special love story. Launching a book of this series series is something I've wanted to do for years, and this project is the result of a lot of hard work. The risk that I am faced with is that the book, and my vision, will not get funded. So I am turning to my community – that's you! – to help make this book a reality. ALL the funds I raise on Kickstarter will go towards the design, printing and shipping of this book. My goal is to deliver a final product that is flawless and delivered on time. Books will be in your hands by Fall 2021. Keep your eyes open for a launch party invite too! The book is underway. The photos have been shot and edited. The design and layout are in progress. Now I need your help to bring it all to life. Pre-order your copy of Beach Lovers and help me tell this NYC Summer love story that will also look great on your coffee table. There's something for every level of support you can offer, so don't be shy. Thank you for helping to make this book happen!

Other Ways You Can Help

Donate and photograph
story_txt:
Other Ways You Can Help
Donate and photograph

story:
New Castro Philanthropy Project 

 

The majority of the work I do as a photographer is for good causes. I volunteer my skills to individuals in financial need and non-profit organizations doing important work in the world. My work as a volunteer photographer can vary from helping a small business owner make promotional images, to documenting projects for non-profits, to offering to shoot portraits for individuals in need for professional purposes. I am including information regarding some of the pro bono work I have done over the last few years here:

https://www.newcastrocameraphotography.com/pro-...

I believe deeply in the power of inclusion, so I work hard to document people who are usually left out of photographs. These are mainly marginalized communities and minorities. I spend time documenting these communities because I find it important that they are visually represented and therefore included. If people don't see themselves depicted in images of the world, they won’t feel welcome in the world. I try to help in my own small way by photographing all people, so they feel represented and welcome, regardless of their economic or social background. I also immerse myself in these communities and get to meet and interact with some amazing and inspirational people. 

The money you contribute to this fundraiser will enable me to grow my craft and continue to give my best work to the communities you and I wish to serve. I work a few paid gigs a year, but they don’t bring in enough money for me to invest in new gear. I also teach full-time as a teacher, but that work covers my cost-of-living expenses. Your gift will enable to focus on my passion for gifting people and communities in need with photography. 

 

Gear I Wish to Purchase

This part is simple. I am seeking your support in order to purchase two pieces of equipment. One is a Fujifilm XT-2 camera. This camera is one of the most affordable professional cameras for the price. I also need a Rotolight LED Light. This is also a very affordable option. I am only comfortable asking for these items because they’re the most economical way to do the work I want to share in the world. This also lets me volunteer my time as opposed to money, which as a teacher I can't afford. I am also a teacher and have volunteered time teaching younger and less experienced photographers in need. Any extra funds would go to that type of work as well. 

 

The Impact

Having new gear will allow me to continue my work for many years to come. It will also allow me to donate my time to help others instead of having to earn the money for gear myself, which, as an educator is very tough. The funds for this project will allow me to help many more people. If my fundraising goals go above what I have asked for, it would allow me to put more money and energy to help others. I could supply prints and materials for others. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot afford to contribute it would be very helpful to offer the following. 

1. Share my campaign on social media. 

2. Purchase my photography services. I offer individual and family portraits. I offer 8mm and 16mm film to video, slide and photograph scanning, and full events (weddings/ bat mitzvah).

3. Refer people to buy my photography services in the future.
story_txt:
New Castro Philanthropy Project 
 
The majority of the work I do as a photographer is for good causes. I volunteer my skills to individuals in financial need and non-profit organizations doing important work in the world. My work as a volunteer photographer can vary from helping a small business owner make promotional images, to documenting projects for non-profits, to offering to shoot portraits for individuals in need for professional purposes. I am including information regarding some of the pro bono work I have done over the last few years here:
https://www.newcastrocameraphotography.com/pro-...
I believe deeply in the power of inclusion, so I work hard to document people who are usually left out of photographs. These are mainly marginalized communities and minorities. I spend time documenting these communities because I find it important that they are visually represented and therefore included. If people don't see themselves depicted in images of the world, they won’t feel welcome in the world. I try to help in my own small way by photographing all people, so they feel represented and welcome, regardless of their economic or social background. I also immerse myself in these communities and get to meet and interact with some amazing and inspirational people. 
The money you contribute to this fundraiser will enable me to grow my craft and continue to give my best work to the communities you and I wish to serve. I work a few paid gigs a year, but they don’t bring in enough money for me to invest in new gear. I also teach full-time as a teacher, but that work covers my cost-of-living expenses. Your gift will enable to focus on my passion for gifting people and communities in need with photography.

story:
50 s mammaries is a wonderful book that we have been wanting to produce for a long time to get these beautiful women's pictures world wide . All the photos are from the 1930's -1950's time and show a wonderful contrast of what life was like and how the dress and body shapes of the female body has change and stayed the same , a truly collectors item . we have had the original pictures for a very long time now and need your help . all English women

all the rewards photo postcards are individual pictures in photo quality .

the photos used on the site have been selected to be internet friendly as most of the nude studies are full nudity .

we need  money for the design of the front cover and printing fee's

like i said a truly collectors item book .

we will be getting it published and hope fully it will be available world wide

if we get enough money .

we are looking to get a photo studio soon to continue this amazing beauty .

please help us thank you

matt

x  here are another 2 nude studies  below

remember if we don't get all the funding we wont get any at all .

 please ask any questions you wish .

There are also 50 limited edition books up for grabs for any lucky donor who donates £500 or more . Thank you again

disclaimer : all models were over 18 at time of taking

all postcards will be high gloss  the size will be 216mm x 139mm , all postcards are different pictures .

 all rights reserved all benefits waved

Short Summary

The only challenge I can see is if we get little funding as we cant fund this project on our own.  we need your help .

we will be getting a private company to print  the limited editions that will be backed in leather. size is 28cm x 21cm

and also the half size versions they will be printed by a private company . and sent out when we get the full funding  . 20cm x 15cm

all postcards will be high gloss  the size will be 216mm x 139mm , all postcards are different pictures .

when the printing is finished we will be sending all the rewards out first to the backers of this project .

then we will be sending copies to publishers all over the world and also see if we can get it on kindle too and hopefully will be getting this book published world wide .

remember this is work in progress and we are still collecting many Literary Agency lists too  . when funding hits over the target we will be displaying the first copy online  , let get this published I know there are some good people out there . there has to be  .
and if you have 1 or more of the limited edition books at that time it could be worth a small fortune . at this time we are only offering 50 of the limited editions

 
we will keep updating this page on the progress of the project .


remember  is all or nothing we need to hit our target thank you again .

matt

I am a 30 something trying to get through life like every one else had many many hard times and many many good times . just trying to get a break in life. I am also a painter I make many many paintings I love my art but cant seem to get it out there may be that will be another project . I make wonderful paintings and planetary paintings . just need to get them out there . my family says its all about money I don't believe that I believe we are all human and all need a helping hand .

story:
This is a book about Los Angeles

Shooting in 35mm film photography

 

The Story

I have that type of personality that just gets excited about a lot of things.

All of my interests whether it's surfing, whether it's photography, whether it's music or classic cars, to me there's always a common thread through it all.

This idea of just finding enjoyment and things that are challenging.

In 2015 i'm graduated from Cinema University in Lisbon, Portugal, and after that, I flew to Los Angeles to do an internship for 3 months. When I arrived there I saw that LA is not what the majority of the people think and see in the movies, that city has a big soul surrounded by different cultures, who live their everyday lives trying hard to survive in that jungle.

It was that vibe of the city, his vibrant energy who makes me start shooting since the first day. I remember the day that I arrived, i'm staying in a hostel close to Pico Blvd, it was not the most fancy area, but for me was a start and I like that, i like to see the real life of the city, not the fake part. So I take my film camera and my skate and start shooting and exploring. I remember that first day I finished in Venice Beach with a very big orange sunset behind the skatepark and said to myself, This is LA.

It was day life and that mix of cultures and freedom who fascinated me. The city is huge, and i explore a lot, i run skate, bicycle and off course you need a car, one day i was editing some fresh scanned photos in a coffee shop and girl pass me, and said, "i like the vibe of your pictures, you should think to do something with that..."

That quote made me think, and if I someday make an exhibition or publish a book, it was called...

"ANGELS BEHIND THE STARS"

 

 

I finished my journey after 3 months, but the idea to come back was always in my mind, i've been working as a Director of Photography and Photographer in Portugal since that, and this year, when the whole world stops, i've decided to organize all the films that i have. When i saw the frames from Los Angeles, the idea to make something organic with that, to make a piece of art and not just a random frames, in that particular time the name "Angels behind the Stars" come back to my mind and i decided to go back to LA and finish what i started five years ago.

 

The book

  • The finished book will be a hardcover, using traditional bookmaking methods to produce each book by hand in the highest quality possible.
  • If you pledge $65 and up you are effectively pre-ordering a copy of the book.
  • Self published book

 

 

my tool

 

Your Support

 

This Journey will start in January of 2021

With the support of this project, I will take the capacity to stay in the city and time to breath and to feel the environment around for 3 months. 

This budget will cover the flights, the accommodation, the film stock, the developing, and to publish and ship the book. 

All of this process and journey will be shared by daily posts on instagram, mailing list directly to the people who sponsor me and i gonna have a blog on my web site where i'm gonna post the all the journey.

In the end a will develop in live and show the process of developing b&w film. 

The book will be shipped in the April of 2021.

Thank you. Thank you. Thank you.

 

 

 

 

What backers will receive

 

6$ - Thank you!

Thanks for joining us! You'll gain email updates, behind the scenes photos and big thank you from us.

10$ - Digital Wallpaper

You will receive two exclusive images to decorate your computer screen. These are special images, and to be found nowhere else, ever. Seriously.

29$ - Special Edition Print

A signed archival print of your choice, featuring an image from the book. And a huge thank you for supporting this campaign.

58$ - The Book

Signed Book This 12x9" coffee table book captures the soul of Los Angeles. And a huge thank you for supporting this campaign.

115$ - The Book + Fine Art Print

Signed Hardcover Book + Fine Art Print This 12x9" coffee table book captures the soul of Los Angeles + 11x14 Fine Art Print And a huge thank you for supporting this campaign.

210$ - Book + Limited Fine Art Print

Signed Hardcover Book + Limited Fine Art Print This 12x9" coffee table book captures the soul of Los Angeles, and a Limited Fine Art Frame 20x24 Your name in the benefactors list in the book. And a huge thank you for supporting this campaign.

500$ - Special Edition

Signed Hardcover Book + Two Limited Fine Art Print This 12x9" coffee table book captures the soul of Los Angeles, and a two Limited Fine Art Frame 20x24 (Framed) Your name in the benefactors list in the book. And a huge thank you for supporting this campaign.

All the perks will be shipped during April2021

 

Limited Prints:

#1 Limited Print

#2 Limited print

 

 

About me

during my journey in India in 2019

Born in Lisbon in 1987, I soon fell in love with the art of capturing moments. There’s something about picking up a camera that makes my blood rush faster. So after getting a degree in Cinema in Portugal, I moved to LA for 3 month to strengthen my knowledge. Since I came back to my hometown I’ve shot a variety of projects, but my heart keeps on pounding with every new project I embrace.

You can see some of my work:

www.brunomangas.com

@brunomangas

If you want to know more about this project, feel free to contact me:

b.oliveiramangas@gmail.com

 

Risks & Challenges

In this strange times in world right now because of covid-19, I believe that we need to keep moving forward and maintain that soul and that's the biggest challenge.

 

 

Thanks a lot to everyone who believe in this project!

story:
We are HONEST.

A dedicated band of friends (7 to be precise), who are not only in love with film photography but are also very passionate about sharing a beautiful art form.

In October 2014 the idea was born to create a print magazine dedicated exclusively to analogue photography called HONEST., featuring the work of a wide variety of international film photographers. Read more about the beginnings of HONEST. on our blog!

When we started we were blessed with:

  • incredible photographers
  • an amazing printer
  • a well organised and heavily pregnant Layout designer
  • a restless word grafter with a not so light travel typewriter
  • a New York journalist with a sense for business and culinary masterpieces
  • all-in-all a crazy bunch of motivated people!

3 months later our baby Issue 0 was born (first edition: 1000 magazines) and soon after that we had our soft launch in New York City! 

Now we want to go on.

l.t.r: Stefanie Neunteufl, Hans-Jürgen Hein, Xenia Bluhm

What We Need

To be perfectly HONEST. with you, the €10 000 are the bare minimum that we need to go on while still being able to give something back to the people who helped create the magazine in the first place - who have thus far been working for free and paying out of pocket since October 2014.

The €10 000 will also help build the foundation for future projects, such as Issue I and II, an HONEST. Gallery (to pimp out our artists… uhm… promote them of course), or maybe even an office space, since we are currently working out of our living rooms, bedrooms and yes, sometimes even our bathrooms.

Our very skilled social media unicorn made this informative pie chart for you, so it is transparent what the money will be used for exactly:


What You Get

We have unique perks set up for you! In HONEST. Tribe Style you can either join us as an Analogue Settler (Postcards, Postcards, Postcards!), an ISO Chieftain (Issue 0, two of them!) all the way up to a Shutter Speed Deity (Your own special edition! With your face on it! Seriously!).

If you have trouble deciding which of our 8 Packages is the right one for you, don’t you worry, we will introduce every single perk as the campaign goes along!

Look and Feel Video of HONEST. Issue ø :

https://vimeo.com/127706460

The Impact

We have come together to pursue a shared vision: building a community of artists, enthusiasts and idealists who are all bound by a deep passion for the pure and authentic art of film photography. We want to make a great print magazine that you can rip apart and hang on your walls or put out on your coffee table when Auntie Elly is coming over for tea.

HONEST. has gotten a great resonance from professionals as well as amateurs. The magazine has been picked up by a number of stores and is no longer exclusively available online! See our blog for a full list of shops, where you can find us!

Since our soft launch we got lined up for blogs as well as lifestyle print magazines, and we were able to collect a great amount of HONEST. Advocates, who share their art with us on Facebook as well as on Instagram. The numbers of superb photographers who are submitting their work through our website is ever-expanding. In a world where the tendency of working against each other in order to achieve success becomes a daily battle, we want to create an environment where everyone supports individual creativity by working together!



Risks & Challenges

"Print is dead. Film is dead."

No they are not! We haven’t stumbled on any obituaries yet. Print and film still do exist, monthly and quarterly magazines are actually thriving! And as long as they do, we will use them as the beautiful mediums they are. 

While our main focus clearly is on analogue photography, we do not ban digital work from our work flow. A challenge we encountered early on was people thinking that we were against digital photography. We are not. Yes, we like to take pictures with our digital cameras sometimes, as well as the obligatory cellphone selfies (yeah, we do that). But we do feel the need to give our passion, our love that is film photography, its own space to breathe and continue to grow and thrive in this modern digital world.

We know that HONEST. is a niche product and niche products do carry risks. But what is the worst that could happen? That we crash with flying colours? Yeah maybe, but we will have a lovely magazine to read on the way down.

(We are not going down, by the way.)


Where do the funds go if we don't reach our goal?

Easy. Back to you.

No, we are not crazy. No, none of us are addicted gamblers who go all-in just for the adrenaline rush. We simply trust our product and know what we need to make it the way it’s meant to be done. We don’t feel like keeping your hard earned money for something that didn’t work out on this platform.

Nevertheless, you did support us and you are now part of the tribe! Which is awesome! The reason we do what we do is not to have big investors push us, but rather a band of friends to join us. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Please, please don’t feel bad if you cannot contribute! You can still help us!

Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! Knock on your neighbor's door, call your long lost cousin, send a message in a bottle or smoke signals (please no carrier pigeons, they tend to get lost a lot)!

... or use the Indiegogo share tools to do that!

You can also join the #honesttribe by simply liking us on Facebook and/or following us on Instagram and Twitter!

While our main focus clearly is on analogue photography, we do not ban
digital work from our work flow. A challenge we encountered early on was people
thinking that we were against digital photography. We are not. Yes,
we like to take pictures with our digital cameras sometimes, as well as the
obligatory cellphone selfies (yeah, we do that). But we do feel the need to
give our passion, our love that is film photography, its own space to breathe
and continue to grow and thrive in this modern digital world.

We know that HONEST. is a niche product and niche products do carry risks. But what is the worst that could happen? That we crash with flying colours? Yeah maybe, but we will have a lovely magazine to read on the way down.
(We are not going down, by the way.)

Where do the funds go if we don't reach our goal?

Easy. Back to you.
No, we are not crazy. No, none of us are addicted gamblers who go all-in just for the adrenaline rush. We simply trust our product and know what we need to make it the way it’s meant to be done. We don’t feel like keeping your hard earned money for something that didn’t work out on this platform.
Nevertheless, you did support us and you are now part of the tribe! Which is awesome! The reason we do what we do is not to have big investors push us, but rather a band of friends to join us. 
   Other Ways You Can Help 

Please, please don’t feel bad if you cannot contribute! You can still
help us!
Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! Knock on your neighbor's door, call your long lost cousin, send a message in a bottle or smoke signals (please no carrier pigeons, they
tend to get lost a lot)!
... or use the Indiegogo share tools to do that!
You can also join the #honesttribe by simply liking us on Facebook and/or following us on Instagram and Twitter!

story: i am part time photographer, not professional ,i do job also. i travel worldwide and when i get time i click some photos.
story_txt: i am part time photographer, not professional ,i do job also. i travel worldwide and when i get time i click some photos.

story:
Hello - my name is Julian Kirschler. I am a german photographer, based in Berlin and Pforzheim.

'You are here...'

is the title of a photo art project that, for the first time, combines different kinds of landscape photography and a series of conceptual portraits.

The stage for our enterprise is an island in the Northern Atlantic about which, Kate Humble has said the following in the course of the BBC report ´A Volcano Live Special´:

'I think this is the strangest most otherworldly landscape I’ve ever seen. It's just great chaotic -­‐ lumps and piles of rock covered in this thick khaki grey moss. It's just weird. It's almost as if some giant crumbled up pieces of cake all over the plains and they've gone moldy.'

It´s all about Iceland!

Former State President Vigdis Finnbogadóttir responded in our interview in 2009, when addressed on the financial crisis: 'Iceland will master this challenge -­‐ the worse the situation, the more composed the Icelander will react.'  She also indicated a relation between landscape and people.

Vigdis Finnbogadóttir, April 2009 © Julian Kirschler

Our Mission:

Photography for international exhibitions and 3 illustrated books...

'The land makes the people' is one of the central issues that I deal with in 'You are here...' with photographic means. 

'You are here...' will be realized for international exhibitions and 3 illustrated books, that will be published by ARNOLDSCHE ART PUBLISHERS with the following contents:

1. AIRshots – aerial images
    containing text originating from the 'Icelandic Journal' 1871/73 by William Morris
2. CARshots & FLOWshots – photographs taken out of the driving car a.o.
    containing text originating from the 'Icelandic Journal' by 1871/73 William Morris
3. Portraits – more than 100 Portraits in front of a neutral background
    (each book has 120 pages)

To show our work in museums up to sizes of 4 x 6 meters, we shoot with a 80 MP High Resolution Camera.

How the story began...

during the course of the political report with the title ‘No man is an island - Moments captured between fire and ice’, wich I accomplished as a photographer together with the journalist Thomas Rump in 2009 –  I made my first aerial shots of iceland.

Þingvellir, April 2009 © Julian Kirschler

Left to right: Ágúst Már Kristinsson and Thomas Rump. In front: Julian Kirschler

somewhere in the middle of nowhere, Iceland in April 2009 © Julian Kirschler

The birth of 'You are here...'

In the year 2011 Ágúst accompanied me again to Iceland and we started to photograph the glacier region of Vatnajökull from above and furthermore started the concept CARshots with a series of landscape photography out of a driving car – both now basal for the 'You are here...' art project.

AIRshot, Vatnajökull August 2011 © Julian Kirschler

CARshot, Geitdalur, September 2011 © Julian Kirschler


In the end of 2011 I made a test exhibition of our AIRshots and CARshots, with the goal to validate my assumptions on the effect of the photographs and their size on an audience. I showed images sized up to 180 cm x 120 cm and was happy to find assumptions confirmed by most of the 100 guests.

"The images should be even much larger"

The photographs seem picturesque, what has also been directly said that evening: 

'This is actually not photography but one has tried to paint'.

Together with this exhibition I self published a photo book with an important aspect of uniqueness, created by the adding of text to my landscape photography -­‐ text from a different time and even different places on Iceland. The idea here for, was contributed by Elisa Artega, who works with the graphic artist who helped me with the book. 

The words originate from the 'Icelandic Journal' by William Morris, who visited Iceland in 1871. His depiction of the landscape complement my photography in a wondrous way. 


book excerpt AIRshots I Carshots © Julian Kirschler 2011

In 2012 I first started to think about adding a special kind of portrait photography to the concept, remembering that I had met various Icelanders, portrayed some of them.
E.g. Vigdis Finnbogadóttir, former state president of Iceland, or Hördur Torfason, at the time one of the leading heads of the Icelandic protest movement and some others, and I found out that not only the nature is unique, but that also the people, in their own way represent things I can hardly put into words.Things that maybe have something to do with terms like grace, strength and being aware of oneself. 

Another important aspect is, that I hadn't seen myself as a landscape photographer before this absurd icelandic nature inspired me in 2009 - I´m actually much more a portrait photographer. So now I can wonderfully bring these things together in a project, which I think is completely new in history of photography. 


Description of the portrait concept within 'You are here...':

My portrait photographic philosophy is among other things influenced by Richard Avedon's formidable opus 'In the American West’.
The plan is to portray persons from various groups of society and professions, such as farmers, fishermen, pilots, students, volcanologists, kids and old people etc. on location, in front of the always same background, and furthermore do the same with internationally well known personalities, like artists, musicians, writers, actors….

Thanks to Ágúst, we are very well networked in Iceland, so that the enterprise of making more than 100 portraits of Icelanders-­‐ a profile of the whole community-­‐ will be easy to conduct. 

Just to give you an idea, how our portraits might look alike - I show you following portrait from the year 2008 as a sample. 

Studiowork , Germany 2008 © Julian Kirschler

But finally I am open minded - I want to be inspired by the atmosphere on the set and open for the interaction with the people I portray.
The only thing I really know according to the Portraits is that we will build a setting where the people feel themselves comfortable with us, so that great things can rise.

As things stand now...

We have a letter of intend of the internationally well known publisher ARNOLDSCHE ART PUBLISHERS to present. We also have an letter of intend of a first museum to present, where we can expose 'You are here…' in 2015.

First visualizations for the museum for a first "You are here..." exhibition in 2015.

Why do we need Your support?

Together with my production manager and scout Ágúst Már Kristinsson - i need to produce further pictures in superb 80 Megapixel quality. This will enable us to show unique images with a 'WOW effect' in museums all over the world, some of them sized even up to 4 x 6 meters. This is the last step to complete a photographic work, we already began and that was fully funded by myself.

Bank advisors unfortunately laugh at you, when you ask to obtain funding for a serious art project.

What do we ask you to support?

 Your support enables me to realize following issues:

- the whole production in Iceland this summer within about 4 Months
- paying my assistants fairly
- hiring some of the high end technical equipment we need 
- getting to Iceland
- hiring a home base apartment in Reykjavik
- hiring a 4whd  production car to shoot further CARshots
- hiring production planes and helicopters to shoot further AIRshots
- traveling all over Iceland to cast and shoot portraits in front of a neutral background
- hiring apartments or hotel rooms when we´re on tour to do portraits,or landscapes
- the final artwork for more than 200 very high defintion images for the books
- starting the artwork for the book with an excellent graphic designer
- starting the preprint process of the books
- proofing more than 200 images for the art printing

What will you get for supporting us?

We offer you a wide range of things, for everything you like and you can affort.
Starting up with your name in our backers list, for just a few bucks, on
 www.you-are-here.is, over a set of beautiful postcards to our book box, which will be delivered in premium art print quality. You will find different sized, prized and limited photo prints, all in certified quality (durable for decades).  

Art Print dimensions in inches:
30  x  40      cm =  12 x 16   in
40   x  60     cm = 14 x 24    in
120 x  180   cm = 47 x 70    in
200 x 300    cm = 78 x 118  in

Book dimensions in inches:
24  x  29     cm =  9 x 11   in  for ‘AIRshots’, ‘CARshots’
29  x  24     cm =  11 x 9    in  for ‘Portraits’


Further on you may get in contact with us and can either observe, or even be part of the process by assisting me during different genres of photography, adventures included.

Last but not least we have 3 outstanding offers with a wink, but certainly serious.... 


*Wanna feel like 'Walter Mitty'?

In the Ben Stiller movie 'The Secret Life of Walter Mitty' the main character searches for a photo negative believed to be missing and finds a great adventure, among others in Iceland.
You don´t have to undergo the search for a photo negative to get to Iceland and to experience a real adventure. You can help us realizing touching images and go with us on an exciting journey of four months - or how long ever you want to - to Iceland.
We will certainly find more than we were searching for.
So come on, let´s make an appointment where and when to meet!
You press the perk button, together we do the rest ;-)

** And the winner is....

Buying something, does not mean much for you, for you already own everything money can buy. Maybe you don´t look for much adventure, but for something really satisfying.
Here you you are! ....You made this artwork happen, own 3 fabulous and rare pictures and flew in an airplane over Iceland. And finally there is the gratification with your own dedication in amazing art books. And in case you are a native born Icelander, you even find your icon immortalized in the 'You are here...' 'Portraits' book.
Sounds like happiness, doesn´t it?

*** You are 'Walter Mitty'? 

Great -  I really don't need to tell you something about the figure 'Walter Mitty' in the film
'The Secret Life of Walter Mitty' - I guess you´re deeper in, than I am. By the way -
I, as a photographer, was very touched by your movie! Congratulations!
I thought, that we can make you a very special offer: ;-)

You may choose the location, where we do an AIRshot or a CARshot, you may even join us, if you like to. You also may point your finger at your icelandic buddies and we´re gonna portray them for you. Or you surprise yourself and have trust that we offer you the most beautiful 5 images. By the way, choose any size up to 2 x 3 meters.

So, just make up you mind, let us know and we're already in business! 
You press the perk button, we do the rest ;-)

Finally...me, Ágúst,
Dr. Christian Schoen and
Dirk Allgeier from ARNOLDSCHE ART PUBLISHERS....

.... thank you for paying attention to our project so far!
We would so much appreciate if you would become part of our project by supporting us in any way - by swooping for some of our great perks - or if you can’t contribute, maybe by sharing this campaign with your friends on facebook, twitter or even by sending this link to your email contacts who you think might be interested.

Please help us to complete our artwork. Help us to bring these incredibly fascinating, touching and unaffected landscapes and the exciting people into 'your' books and in museums all over the world.Thank you for contributing!

story:
Om boken

I fotoboken Studentajävlar samlar jag ett urval av alla de tusentals bilder jag tagit under åren som fotograf och bildchef på tidningen Lundagård. Genom att göra en bok får jag äntligen möjlighet att ge bildreportagen det utrymme de förtjänar och dela med mig av foto som aldrig kom i tryck. Jag har alltid tyckt att bilden av studentlivet ibland blir för snäv och därför har jag försökt ge en mångfacetterad bild av hur det är att vara student i Lund idag. Men det som man tydligt förknippar med lunds studentliv finns såklart också representerat i boken.  I boken ryms bilder från ryttarföreningen LARS, husockupationer, Hallands nations fotbollslag, Prästvigning i domkyrkan, utgrävningar i Uppåkra, Karnevalståg och karnevalskabaré, studentkörsturné, kafferep hemma hos rektorn,  Spexet Ivar Kreuger och mycket mer. Allt skildrat utifrån studentens perspektiv och med människor och möten i fokus.

Även om många kan känna igen sig i boken så är syftet att den ska vara mer än en intern angelägenhet. Men för många kan den säkert hjälpa till att fylla lite av det tomrum som uppstår när man lämnat Lund och undrar vad det var som egentligen hände. 

Jag hoppas att du, genom att förhandsbeställa ett ex av boken, gör det möjligt för mig att trycka den! Genom att stödja projektet i detta skedet blir du också omnämnd i bokens inledning, utöver det att du har min eviga tacksamhet.

Tack på förhand!

 

Utformning & tryck

Boken blir ca 160 sidor och trycks i högsta kvalitet. Den blir inbunden med hårdband. Det första avsnittet av boken består i en serie längre bildreportage och det andra avsnittet av boken består av porträtt och ögonblicksbilder. Boken består i huvudsak av foto men med kortare kompletterande texter.

Att realisera projektet

Att realisera detta projekt bygger på att jag kan finansiera tryckkostnaden genom att ca 250 böcker förhandsbeställs. Här behöver jag din hjälp! Om detta uppnås kan projektet direkt skickas iväg till tryck då boken är i stort färdigställd och priset för tryck är baserat på offerter som jag tagit in från en rad olika tryckerier.

Foto ur boken: Karnevalens avslutning

story:
BIG NEW THING! 

So I just got an email from someone who gave me the low down on a better printing place for MUCH MUCH CHEAPER.

 

Thing is, I can't change my $$ goal. 

 

BUT I CAN SWEETEN THE POT LIKE A MOFO

 

So here's the deal: I can do *5* costumes. And I will be UPGRADIN' LIKE A MOFO! 

 

SO: Everyone that got

3 posters will get:  3 posters & 2 8x10s

**also- the Wonder Woman & Vampirella posters will be limited edition, with only 50 of each printed**

1 poster: 1 poster & 4 8x10s

3 8x10s: 5 8x10s! 

1 8x10: 1 8x10 and 4 postcards

3 postcards: 3 Postcards and 2 Digitals

1 Postcard: 1 Postcard  and 4 Digitals

3 Digitals: ALL 5 Digitals! 

There are now 5 sets of Bindings available and each will include a set of personalized & signed postcards. 

 

 

Me. Tied up in Scanty Nerd cosplay. With Photos by the Ever-So-Talented Richard Kadrey

Harley Quinn

Wonder Woman

Vampirella

Almost $5K is going toward printing postcards, posters and shirts.

*This is a lie. I'm not really giving them puppies. Unless they want one. Then I'll take them to a shellter and we'll find them a nice dog that matches their lifestyle.

story:
If you have any queries regarding the Magic Album, distribution, technical questions, or any other issues you can contact us at: kevin@xiculture.com

 

Wish you could send a video-postcard of your vacation? Or place videos in your wedding album? How about making a Christmas card and including a video? Or how about just being that much closer to the wonder of the Potterverse and having moving photos?

Magic album allows you to take your most treasured memories, whether they are photos, videos or audio recordings and save them as QR codes, which you can place on a postcard, a photo album, or even a notebook to send to your friends, almost like a photograph taken by Colin Creevey's camera!

Those who receive your album or postcard only have to scan the code with their phone to be taken to an online private file to view, watch or listen to the memories you’re sharing on their phone.

 

 

Unlike a traditional photo album, you can’t exactly put videos or recordings between your favourite memories and photos. The Magic Album allows you to save your memories in a magical way so you can send a postcard with a video attached to it, add a recording to a notebook wishing your kids good luck in their school year, or add photos in a family album only accessible through your phone.

 

Find the perfect way to memorialize your adventures and share them!

 

 

Creating your own Magic Album is extremely simple. There are no downloads, data sharing, or apps required! Just follow the 4 handy steps below to immortalize your favorite memories.

 

Well, we collect a little data - the photos and videos you share so we can host them privately on our servers!

However, Magic Album requires no apps or downloads to use. Everything is done through our intuitive website.

Since there are no downloads of any sort, Magic Album does not collect any data with all the files encrypted and stored to your unique QR codes.

 

You can use either your iPhone or your Android smartphone to scan and embed videos, photos and audio recordings into your Magic Album or Postcard!

Step 1: Open up the camera app on your iPhone or iPad; Or quick open Control Center, "scan QR code" is on the left bottom corner (IOS 12).
Step 2: Hold the device's camera up to the QR code to scan it;
Step 3: No need to hit the shutter button, your iOS device will automatically recognize the QR code and provide you with an on-screen notification. (Make sure you have the mobile signal or you're connected to Wi-Fi.)

Android user won’t have to download any apps either, they can scan using their camera and Google Screen Search.

Step 1: Open the camera and focus it to QR-code. By holding Home button the content of QR-code comes visible;
Step 2: Scan the QR Code

 

Note: Make sure Google Screen Search is activated on your phone:

  1. Open Google App (icon above), or find Google App on Google Play
  2. Tap the Navigation (three stripes on the upper left corner)
  3. Choose: Setting
  4. Choose: Screen search
  5. Swipe to activate it

story:
Darling Dani is a beautiful, large format photography book that captures the essence of one of the adult industries most alluring stars. Captured by celebrated photographer JM Darling, Dani sizzles in this collection of erotic, titillating, seductive and gorgeous photographic stills.
_________________________________________________________


A NOTE FROM DANI:

"Hi everyone, Dan Daniels here!

I want to thank you for checking out my IndieGoGo project!

Darling Dani is a love letter to my fan's so it’s a project I am very passionate about. I’ve got some really hot ideas for the photographs that will be included in this book that I know you will all love.  Working with JM Darling (a photographer I respect immensely and trust deeply), our goal is to create a timeless visual document that captures the various sides of my personality. From fun and vivacious to glamorous, seductive and downright sexy this book will be every Dani Daniels' fans “must have”. Each of you mean the world to me and your support allows me to explore not only my sexuality but my humanity. I hope you will come along with me for this once in a lifetime experience."

_________________________________________________________

Darling Dani will be a majestic, coffee table style fine-art collection of erotic photography.

About Dani:

Dani Daniels is a 5'7", blue eyed, California native brunette, who since her first year as an adult performer, back in 2011, managed to maintain a special spot at the very top of the movie charts.

Loved by her faithful fans, considered a Girl/Girl Queen even before her award winning movie DANI, for Elegant Angel, her break through into the Boy/Girl world with "Dare" and her most recent "Dani Daniels: Deeper" for Blacked.com, was not only a happy surprise to her followers, but also what made all audiences fall completely in love with her and showcase her many talents such as acting (X-Biz winner for The Vampire Mistress / Sparks Entertainment), her passionate performances and her spot on choices for movies, companies and directors to work with.

As a multiple award winning performer, her star keeps rising and she continues to be known for featuring in big productions for huge companies like Brazzers (nominated for her work in "The Whore of Wall Street"), Digital Playground with "Sisterhood" and the also award nominated "Crave" to name a few.

With almost 4 years in the industry directors and fans can't get enough of her, they know her huge creative potential and that the great work she's been doing is still only the surface for what she can bring to the adult game.

About JM Darling:

JM Darling in an award winning photographer, film and theatre maker. His work has been featured in GQ, Playboy, Esquire, the New York Times, and the Washington Post, as well as Academy Award nominated films. Playboy recently said of his work that "it is hard not be captivated by his incredible artwork and lifestory" while Newsweek Magazine's Creativity Issue featured him as having a "unique visual perspective--he thinks outside the box". Darling currently resides on Martha's Vineyard.

Below are some examples of JM Darling's incredible work...

What We Need & What You Get

Please understand that if this project does not meet its goal, your credit card will NOT be charged and this book will not be produced. Cards are only charged when the project meets its goal and the pledging period ends.

The photos that appear on this page are just samples of previous photos taken by photographer JM Darling and photos from Dani’s own collection and do not represent the photos that will appear in this book should it be successfully funded. Darling Dani will be compiled of brand new, exclusive photos of Dani captured by photographer JM Darling over numerous weeks.

Please continue to support Dani by pledging to this project. The funding period is only 30 days. We estimate that the book, if successfully funded, should be completed within 6 months. Remember, this will be an exclusive book of photography and the contents will not be seen anywhere else. We need this time to properly create a book that is of the highest quality for fans.

We encourage you to check out the pledge levels and especially the rewards for each pledge level. There is a special reward for every Dani fan no matter how large your pledge level.

Thank you for your time and attention and, most importantly, your continued support of Dani.

Risks & Challenges

The risks are relatively low. If we do not reach the funding goal, your credit card will not be charged and the book will not be produced.

All pledging amounts are in $USD

story:
Hello people,

I am Bastien and I live in Paris. Today in France is an interesting time. There is a big contrast between the dreamed romantic Paris and the everyday life we live here, full of bad-media fulling our heads with bullshits, poverty, unemployment on one side & lost people over-consuming on the other. In a word : a declining society.

My project would be to have a good camera enabling me to make a photo & video documentary about this contrast which is I think really representative of the western world. I think today is the good period to interview tourists from abroad & from every part of the french society, from beggar to every high class personn I could reach.

I make photo & videos for long time now and everything produced would be free to use and to share of course. As the project would be crowd funded, I can also think of crowd produced.

The amount of money I need is around 1500€ to make this project alive.

you can see the photos I do here : http://binarymind.deviantart.com/gallery/?sort=...

Well, A friend told me to try this site to reach my goal, I am not sure if this will work or not but anyway.. if you like the idea share & give me the money :)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oAPSNjXSSRQ

all the best
bastien
