Die Mitspieler*innen nennen nun die entsprechenden Daten auf ihrer obersten Karte. Der beste Wert gewinnt und derjenige erhält alle Karten, die in der Runde vorgelesen wurden. Ob leichtere oder schwerere Kameras „besser“ sind, muss vor dem Spielstart vereinbart werden. Die Person mit dem besten Wert legt die gewonnen Karten unter ihren Kartenstapel und ist nun an der Reihe, einen Wert zu wählen. Gewonnen hat, wer zuletzt alle Karten besitzt.

Wie weit seid Ihr?
Die Idee wurde bereits Anfang 2017 geboren und nahm im Lauf der Monate immer weiter Gestalt an. Wir haben uns mit den verschiedenen Kameramodellen auseinandergesetzt, uns in die Kamerageschichte eingelesen und die schönsten und wichtigsten Kameras in Quartette aufgeteilt. Auch die Vergleichswerte sind zum Großteil bereits herausgesucht.
Wir haben Kontakt zu den verschiedenen Kameraherstellern aufgenommen, um rechtliche Punkte zu klären. Bis auf eine Firma haben alle unsere Idee sehr positiv aufgenommen und uns die Erlaubnis gegeben, ihre Markennamen zu verwenden!
Wir konnten die großartige Illustratorin Regina Cekaskin für die Zeichnungen der Kameras gewinnen, die uns schon in der Vergangenheit bei anderen Produkten wie unserer Baumwolltasche unterstützt hat. Um das Kartendesign kümmert sich Fotografin und Designerin Lisa-Marie Kaspar. Die beiden haben für diese Kampagne die ersten drei Karten gezeichnet sowie gestaltet und wir hoffen, Du bist von ihrer Arbeit genauso begeistert wie wir. Sobald die Finanzierung steht, werden sich die beiden an die Arbeit für die restlichen Karten machen.
 
 
Welche Vergleichswerte habt Ihr?
 


Erscheinungsjahr: Das jeweilige Erscheinungsjahr der Kameras.

Gewicht: Wieviel wiegt die Kamera? Diese Angabe steht häufig leider nicht in den alten Werbeanzeigen und Katalogen. Und wenn doch, wurde die Kamera mit oder ohne Objektiv, mit Prisma- oder Schachtsucher gewogen? Teilweise haben wir einige Kameras selbst auf die Waage gestellt oder Freund*innen, Bekannte und unsere Leser*innen dazu angestiftet.

Preis damals: Wieviel hat die Kamera an ihrem Erscheinungsjahr gekostet? Je nach Währung und Zeit ist dieser Wert nur schwer zu vergleichen. Wir haben deshalb die Angaben umgerechnet. Die Preise sind im deutschen Quartett in € (im englischen in USD) angegeben und entsprechen dem Wert, den die Kameras im Verhältnis zu den Lebenskosten hatten.

Preis heute: Wieviel kostet die Kamera heute? Wir haben uns Preise bei Auktionen und Second-Hand-Shops angesehen. Die Preise schwanken je nach Zustand und Glück der Käufer*innen zum Teil. Wir geben im Quartett den Durchschnittspreis einer gut erhaltenen und noch funktionstüchtigen Kamera an.

Google-Treffer: Dieser Punkt war in der Redaktion zugegeben der umstrittenste. Natürlich ist er sehr einfach zu ermitteln, aber darum geht es uns nicht allein. Die Anzahl der Google-Treffer verrät vor allem etwas über die Bekanntheit der Kameras.

Innovationswert: Hier möchten wir aufzeigen, wie wichtig die jeweilige Kamera für die Entwicklung der Kameratechnik war. Gab es bei den jeweiligen Modellen technische Neuerungen, die den Fortschritt der Fotografie vorangetrieben haben, dann bekommt die Kamera von uns einen höheren Innovationswert. Natürlich ist dieser zugegeben etwas subjektiv. Unsere Skala reicht von 1 bis 10.

Die Vergleichswerte stehen relativ fest. Wir können Dir sagen: Es war gar nicht so einfach, geeignete vergleichbare Werte zu finden und einige gute Ideen, wie zum Beispiel die Anzahl der verkauften Exemplare oder der Produktionszeitraum, mussten wir verwerfen, weil wir darüber nicht genügend Informationen gefunden haben.Auf jeder Karte steht zum Schluss noch ein kleiner Text über die Kamera. So bekommst Du noch ein wenig mehr Informationen und erfährst, was die Kamera ausmacht und für was sie besonders bekannt ist.


Wie sind die Quartette unterteilt?
Wir verstehen, dass Du neugierig bist, deshalb legen wir die Karten sprichwörtlich auf den Tisch: Das klassische Spiel besteht aus 32 Karten. Daraus ergeben sich dann acht Quartette. Wir planen aktuell 36 Karten mit neun Quartetten. Eventuell müssen wir es am Ende noch auf die klassische Anzahl reduzieren. Die Entscheidung hängt leider von verschiedenen Faktoren ab.Die neun momentan geplanten Quartette sind: Mittelformatkameras, Großformatkameras, Kleinbildkameras vor 1960, Kleinbildkameras nach 1960, Lomography,  Sofortbildkameras, Pocketfilmkameras, Boxkameras und Zweiäugige Kameras.


Und warum ein Crowdfunding?
Wir sind natürlich begeistert von unserer Idee und würden unglaublich gern dieses Spiel zum Leben erwecken. Unsere finanziellen Möglichkeiten sind allerdings begrenzt und ein Kartenspiel ist nicht so günstig wie man zu Beginn vielleicht denkt.Wir haben schon sehr viel Arbeit und Zeit investiert und sind nun an einem Punkt, an dem wir auch Arbeit an externe Fachkräfte, wie unsere Zeichnerin und Designerin weitergeben müssen. Wir wollen das Kartenspiel in einer deutschen und englischen Variante auf den Markt bringen, weshalb wir gute Übersetzungen brauchen und natürlich soll am Ende auch noch einmal ein externer Experte über unsere ausgewählten Kameramodelle und Vergleichszahlen sehen. Das Ganze ist zwar ein Spiel, aber uns ist wichtig, dass die Daten alle korrekt sind. Zu guter Letzt kommen natürlich auch noch die Druckkosten dazu.Wir möchten uns über das Crowdfunding absichern und wissen, ob unsere Idee wirklich genügend Fans findet, sodass all diese externe Arbeit gerechtfertigt ist und am Ende auch bezahlt werden kann. Möchtest Du uns dabei helfen?
 
Wie läuft die Finanzierung genau?
Das Finanzierungsziel ist mit 8.000 € beim absoluten Minimum angesetzt. Wir gehen in unserer Beispielrechnung von einem Druck von insgesamt 1.000 Kartenspielen im Faltkarton aus:


Wie sieht der Zeitplan aus?
 
Sobald die Finanzierung erfolgreich ist, wird unsere Illustratorin Regina damit beginnen, alle übrigen Kameras zu zeichnen. In dieser Zeit lassen wir auch unsere Werte auf den Karten überprüfen und rechnen unsere bisherigen deutschen Gewichts- und Preisangaben in die amerikanisch-englischen Formate um.
Anschließend bekommt unsere Designerin Lisa-Marie alle Zeichnungen und Werte und gestaltet die Spielkarten. Im Anschluss gehen die Karten nach einer letzten Kontrolle in den Druck und wir freuen uns darauf, sie in alle Welt zu verschicken und natürlich endlich zu spielen!


Welche Risiken gibt es? 
Für Dich gibt es keine Risiken. Sollte das Projekt nicht vor Ablauf der Zeit finanziert werden, wird es leider kein Kartenspiel geben, aber Du erhältst natürlich Dein Geld zurück! Für uns heißt es dann von der Idee Abschied nehmen, was nach all der bisherigen Arbeit nicht leicht wird. Aus eigener Tasche können und werden wir das Projekt nicht verwirklichen können.Wir hoffen natürlich, dass unser Projekt Erfolg hat. Für diesen Fall haben wir Angebote der Druckerei, Designerin, Illustratorin und Übersetzerin eingeholt und mit ihren Preis- und Zeitvorstellungen einen Kosten- und Zeitplan erstellt. Wir sind uns bewusst, dass immer irgendetwas länger dauern kann oder Fehler passieren und dafür Zeitpuffer eingeplant. Sollten wir unseren Zeitplan aus unvorhersehbaren Gründen nicht einhalten können, halten wir Dich auf jeden Fall in den Updates auf dem Laufenden!
Wir haben mit ähnlichen Projekten bereits Erfahrungen: Seit 2016 verkaufen wir erfolgreich etwa alle zwei Monate 300 Überraschungsboxen für Fotograf*innen, gefüllt mit verschiedenen Produkten rund um die Fotografie. Die Planung und der Versand vieler Pakete sind uns also nicht neu. 
Unsere PerksNeben dem Kartenspiel gibt es noch zwei weitere kleine Perks, die wir Euch kurz vorstellen möchten.Baumwolltasche: Unsere Baumwolltasche wurde, wie die Kameras für das Quartett, von Regina Cekaskin gestaltet. Sie wurde aus Baumwollresten, die bei der Produktion anderer Taschen eigentlich als Abfall zurückbleiben, neu verwebt. Mit einer Grammatur von 180 g/m² ist sie zudem sehr robust und reißfest. Mit den langen Henkeln kannst Du ganz bequem Dein Hobby nach außen tragen.Postkarten: Die schönsten Vintagekameras als als Zeichnungen auf Postkarten bekommt Ihr mit diesem Perk. Wir verschicken gleich fünf zufällig ausgewählte Kamerazeichnungen. Gedruckt werden sie auf Premium-Papier mit matten Finish.

story:
Who I am...

Hi I am Cristian! Or how some people that know me personally, Cris. 36 years young, and living in the Netherlands.

A couple of years a go I  took on the challenge to become a photographer and the journey has been amazing so far.  I have met some beautiful souls along the way, and I am sure I will meet plenty more. And of course create more beautiful images.

But to create more beautiful images a bigger budget helps. Helps me pay for film (I shoot mostly analog), places to sleep and eat, and sometimes safety.

Because unfortunately my tooth fairy jar is not infinite I started this! A print sale!

First my work was more street photography oriented, but now with the passing of time I am becoming more of a documentary photographer. My train of thought is; what good is a photograph if you don't know the story behind it.

So that means more talking, more getting to know the people on this beautiful globe. And who knows... Maybe my photographs will help create a better understanding for each other. And in the end, maybe even a better world.

What I Need & What You Get

​I have multiple projects that I am working on. Here in the Netherlands it is my project name Portrait series of the Soul: We are all human. I have got my Israel and Palestinian territories project named, Neshama Shei. But also very important. I am also preparing as we speak my new project in Myanmar (Birma).  And that is why I am organizing this print sale.

In Myanmar I found out about a tribe in the North which I want to visit. And of course, tell their story.  I can't wait to hop on the plane and go there.

The money I will earn during this print sale will be used as funding. Because the more funding I have the better stories I can tell.

Expenses always add up in the end. And it starts with the littlest things, like buying film, and developer. But also there are plenty of other costs. In the case of my upcoming project. Plane tickets. Places of stay. Food. More film. Transportation. A fixer (that is alike a super secret guide.).  And the list goes on and on...

What you will get of course is the beautiful print that you chose to order.

And of course a never ending appreciation to make more work possible.

After this year and more projects are completed I will look for a space again to exhibit work I made from all of my projects. So you will be a big part in making that happen. And that is awesome!

Future Projects.

As you can see I have plenty of projects going on at the moment, but that does not mean I am sitting still afterwards.

Like I already mentioned, every little bit helps. And the more prints I sell the better. Because I am already planning my projects after that. I also am planning to go to Colombia. Back to work on my project in Israel and the Palestinian territories. Back to Iran. Hong Kong I absolutely will not forget. Venezuela and many more...

Risks & Challenges

There is not really a risk or something... Maybe the mailman gets robbed. But other than that... No. It really it nothing more than a print sale. So all my backers get the print anyway.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute you'll be helpful:

  • Sharing my Indiegogo campaign on social networks!
  • Making noise about my project with friends!
  • Visiting and linking my:
    Website: https://cristiangeelen.com/
    Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cristiangeelen
    Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CristianGeelenPhotography
    Twitter: https://twitter.com/cristiangeelen

story:
How to use Zooming Partner (ZP)?

1.Lock the Zooming Partner (ZP) on the belt of the camera bag.

2.Carry on your camera bag, and press the button to open the ZP front cover.

3.Use a coin to adjust a suitable angle and then put in a ZP lens cap.

4.Cover your camera lenses with ZP lens caps, and put them in your camera bag.

Steps to change camera lenses:

1.Unlock the lens from the camera, and open the ZP front cover.

2.Align the connecting points of the lens and ZP lens cap, and turn.

3.Take out the camera lens upward.

4.Take another camera lens, and put the new lens (with ZP lens cap) into ZP.

5.Simply turn to offload the lens cap.

6.Connect the new lens with the camera, and close the ZP front cover.

The process can be done in 8 to 10 seconds, even when it rains.

story:
My Dream:


Trails of Dreams is a Fine Art Photography book inspired from the majestic beauty of Colorado. I am utilizing Indiegogo to create the first 50 hard cover books.

I currently have a personal collection of photographs that range from landscape to macro. However, it is my dream to be able to share them with the world. With YOU, the outstanding backers, I will be able to do just that.

The goal of $3000 will cover the publication of the book. This includes the mountainous hours spent trekking across the state of Colorado. 

I have put my years of living in Colorado to use, I have hiked across the front range, throughout the Rocky Mountains as well as the Pawnee Grasslands. I have hiked to the highest peaks to capture some of the most inspiring images. Spending months capturing this magnificent place has been well worth the photographs that will surely appeal to many.  Once I reach my goal, I know you will appreciate the beauty and passion that has went into the project. 

Whether you can financially back this project or not please share the link. I appreciate all of the support to make this dream become a reality.  Take a look at my rewards, there is surely something for everyone. Thank you for all the support in bringing this dream and passion to life! 

Risks & Challenges

Being a nature photographer comes with a set of risks that I am absolutely qualified to overcome. Whether you pick a package that has me set out to summit a "14er" or walk a mile in your shoes, I will use my knowledge of Colorado and wilderness to utilize this next month to it's fullest potential. If an unfortunate set back does occur I will be notifying all backers immediately. Weather in Colorado changes by the minute, however that has not stopped me. I have equipment that will aid in capturing images that would be a gift from Mother Nature. I feel confident that there will be little to no set backs with this project because I am in control of all publication and destinations that will be pursued to complete the book. This project is in my hands from start to finish. I have created a team of support that will assist with the production from start to finish. I have made ALL necessary arrangements to set out and capture the beautiful and majestic images. I WILL make sure that this project is seen through to the end.


About Me:

I am a (self taught) free-lance photographer.At a very young age, I can remember venturing out on my own with a camera in my hand. I couldn't wait to get back to the house and show my family all the wonderful pictures I had taken. However, it wasn't until recently that I pushed hard to have photography be my passion and career. Growing up, it was always a distant dream of mine. However, so much has happened in the last year to make photography become such a reality. Submerging myself full force into the world of photography has brought me such great opportunities.I am honored to say that I have had the opportunity to shoot for National Geographic. In addition to this wonderful accomplishment, I have also received a variety of awards for my work. With the years to come, I hope that I can go on more adventures, meet great people and capture the majestic beauty of nature.

story:
THE WHAT
------------

At it's core, Phocus is a humanitarian photography project whose intention is to shine a light on the captivating stores and struggles of NGOs, charities, their members, their constituents, and those they are dedicated to helping and serving across the globe.

It's really all quite simple. I want to travel to regions that are seemingly forgotten, I want to help people that need it, and I want to create rich interactive digital publications with engaging images, video, and narratives as a means of sharing those stories. I will start with iOS publications and if I raise enough money will try to release an Android tablet version as well.

The plan is to spend several weeks in Guatemala, return, produce and publish that book, and then launch another campaign to move onto the next location until I have covered the issues, struggles, and lives on every continent in an attempt to help introduce the rest of the world to…well…each other.

I will begin with Guatemala due to the simple fact that over 50% of children in the country under 5 years old are chronically malnourished. It's the highest rate of malnutrition in Latin America, and the 4th highest rate in the world.

THE WHY
-----------

Today's technologies have introduced a wide array of entirely new delivery methods to an entirely new generation of people that are engaging with these delivery methods at a pace never before seen in any medium. One of the most exciting is the transformation that the publication business has undertaken over the past few years. What was traditionally words and pictures printed on static paper have evolved into so much more - pictures that literally come to life before you - stories being told by the very voices behind the faces in front of you.

This is precisely the medium in which I aim to deliver the Phocus series.

Through a continually updated blog and twitter feed, and ultimately, an interactive tablet photo book chalk full of rich imagery, engaging video and narratives in various forms, my aim is to utilize the resources available in today's incredible media landscape to capture and show and tell the heartwarming and inspiring stories of struggle, survival, and perseverance of some of our world's most valuable, yet under-appreciated, heroes.

And I feel I'm now in perfect position to do that.

I've founded, owned, run, written for, and worked for various publications, so I'm more than familiar with the processes ingrained within. I've created videos assets for Fortune 500 companies as well as non-profits, so I'm very versed in the languages of marketing and advertising and publicity. I've managed to build considerable momentum in a career in photography over the past several years, so I'm more than proficient there. And I've already helped create two prototype ebooks with interactive assets that have been received incredibly well, one as an educational curriculum, and one as a wellness based publication - and it is precisely those experiences that made me see the incredibly promising potential these things have. The intuitive nature and rise of the tablet and mobile generation has opened up avenues that traditional print media couldn't even dream of just a short 5 years ago.

The past 3 years especially have seen INCREDIBLE strides in the world of multi-media publishing. With the advent of and the publics unprecedented embrace of tablets, the technologies and methods afforded to use between Apples iBooks and Adobe's Digital Publishing Suite, and the capabilities gifted to us in today's insanely versatile cameras, the timing and market is ripe and perfect for a project of this nature.

Look back over my body of work, especially when I was publishing Kotori Magazine, as well as my work with Earthtones.org, and you'll see that one thread that has survived all along the journey is the desire to experience first hand the daily issues that the majority of the world's populations are dealing with, and try to bridge that disconnect in emotional and universally beneficial ways.

The globe’s NGOs are too busy stretching every minute and penny that they have to affect the lives of the people they are so dedicated to helping, and consequently, they don't have the time, the resources or the money to bring the attention to their work that they need or that an independent effort is capable of doing for them. That's why I'd like to bring my skills and energies to them, to help them make their case and reveal to the viewer some of the most compelling and emotional stories the world has to offer, but has yet to hear.

The world needs these stories.

Essentially, what I hope to show is that while we all have struggles that are specific to our areas, we're all exactly the same. We all want, and need, the very same things, and we all share the very same dreams, hopes, and goals. Perhaps through a format in which we're not just reading about them, but we're seeing them, and we're not just seeing them, but we're hearing them, and we're not just hearing them, we're experiencing what they're experiencing right along with them, the doors of empathy can open, and together, we can create miracles.

And I've already helped create two prototype ebooks with interactive 
assets that have been received incredibly well, one as an educational 
curriculum, and one as a wellness based publication - 
	
		and it is precisely those experiences that made me see the incredibly 
promising potential these things have. The intuitive nature and rise of 
the tablet and mobile generation has opened up avenues that traditional 
print media couldn't even dream of just a short 5 years ago.The 
past 3 years especially have seen INCREDIBLE strides in the world of 
multi-media publishing. With the advent of and the publics unprecedented
 embrace of tablets, the technologies and methods afforded to use 
between Apples iBooks and Adobe's Digital Publishing Suite, and the 
capabilities gifted to us in today's insanely versatile cameras, the 
timing and market is ripe and perfect for a project of this nature.Look
 back over my body of work, especially when I was publishing Kotori Magazine, as well as my work with Earthtones.org, and you'll see that one thread that has 
survived all along the journey is the desire to experience first hand 
the daily issues that the majority of the world's populations are 
dealing with, and try to bridge that disconnect in emotional and 
universally beneficial ways.The globe’s NGOs are too busy 
stretching every minute and penny that they have to affect the lives of 
the people they are so dedicated to helping, and consequently, 
they don't have the time, the resources or the money to bring the 
attention to their work that they need or that an independent effort is 
capable of doing for them. That's why I'd like to bring my skills and 
energies to them, to help them make their case and reveal to the viewer 
some of the most compelling and emotional stories the world has to 
offer, but has yet to hear.The world needs these stories.Essentially,
 what I hope to show is that while we all have struggles that are 
specific to our areas, we're all exactly the same. We all want, and 
need, the very same things, and we all share the very same dreams, 
hopes, and goals. Perhaps through a format in which we're not just 
reading about them, but we're seeing them, and we're not just seeing 
them, but we're hearing them, and we're not just hearing them, we're 
experiencing what they're experiencing right along with them, the doors 
of empathy can open, and together, we can create miracles.

story:
STORY IN BULGARIAN - SCROLL DOWN

ЗА ОПИСАНИЕ НА БЪЛГАРСКИ ЕЗИК - МОЛЯ ВИЖТЕ ПО-ДОЛУ

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

What is URBAN SAINTS?

 

 

URBAN SAINTS is a series of portrait photographs that I started in 2012. The idea was to meet and photograph beautiful inspiring women in a very specific iconic way, that not only showcases their charisma and personality but also draws attention to the beauty of urban architecture.

These photos are very near and dear to my heart and in a way are the main reason I ever got involved in photography in the first place. It has given me the opportunity to interact with awesome people, create cool and lasting friendships, find inspiring and beautiful places and overall has been an amazing experience.

 

 

My professional background is graphic design and branding and I had always had great passion and admiration for compelling photography. A few years ago, 5 to be exact, I was able to get my hands on a decent camera and so my journey into this unlimited area of inspiration began. 

The URBAN SAINTS photo series was my first major attempt at creating something with a back-story and an overall specific theme. And now, 5 years later the time has come to try to bring this project to life and evolve from being just an online gallery to a real life item, that everyone can hold in their hands.

This has been a dream of mine for a long time and I finally decided to give this a try and with your precious help, I can achieve something that will be a fitting manifestation of something very important in my artistic and personal life.

 

The Book

 

 

The aim of this campaign is to create a unique and beautiful showcase in the form of a coffee-table photography book.

I want to create a very high-quality item and a book that does justice to the beauty that is portrayed in each of the photographs. I didn't want to make it too small, too flimsy and basically have something that will "just do for now". I wanted to make a classy and exquisite publication. High-quality paper, high-quality hardcover, and a size that lets the viewers take in all of the beauty and expression of each individual photograph.

 

The book will be available for the listed price only during the length of the Indiegogo campaign.

 

 

These are the technical details of the book:

  • Size: A4 (210/297mm)
  • Number of pages: 128
  • High-quality hardcover
  • Number of photographs: 60
  • Body paper: Chrome White Paper 170g/sqm
  • Hardcover: 2.5 mm

 

The money will be used print production, finishing details, packaging, shipping costs, model royalties and last, but not least, arranging the launch party where I can meet everyone that has helped me turn this dream into reality (and also everyone that can and wants to come and say Hi). 

If the funding goal is not met, every backer will be refunded.

Shipment within Bulgaria is free. Shipment to the rest of the world is priced according to Bulgarian Post Pricing.

 

Rewards

 

THANK YOU Pack - 5 $

 

 

This reward consists of a handwritten THANK YOU email from me to you.

Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book.

 

POSTCARD Pack - 10 $

 

 

This reward consists of a handwritten THANK YOU email and a signed copy of the URBAN SAINTS postcard with a photograph of your choice. 

Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book.

 

POSTER Pack - 15 $

 

 

This reward consists of a handwritten THANK YOU email, a signed copy of the URBAN SAINTS postcard with a photograph of your choice and a signed URBAN SAINTS poster witha photograph of your choice.

  • The listed price of the book will be available during the Indigogo campaign only. 

Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book. 

 

URBAN SAINTS Pack - 27 $

 

 

This reward consists of a handwritten THANK YOU email, a signed copy of the URBAN SAINTS postcard with a photograph of your choice and a signed copy of the URBAN SAINTS photography book.

  • The listed price of the book will be available during the Indigogo campaign only. 

Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book. 

 

GIFT Pack - 52 $

 

 

This reward consists of a handwritten THANK YOU email, two signed copies of the URBAN SAINTS postcard with the photograph of your choice and two signed copies of the URBAN SAINTS photography book.

Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book. 

 

FAIR Pack - 125 $

 

 

This reward consists of 5 (five) signed copies of the URBAN SAINTS photography book.

  • The listed price of the book will be available during the Indigogo campaign only. Regular retail price will be 32$.

Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book. 

 

BOOKSTORE Pack - 245 $

 

 

This reward consists of 10 (ten) signed copies of the URBAN SAINTS photography book.

  • The listed price of the book will be available during the Indigogo campaign only. Regular retail price will be 32$.

Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book. 

 

Stretch Goals

 

The original print run, that is set up for this campaign is 250 copies.

Additional to that I have planned a couple of extra goals/milestones that in terms of printing costs will allow me to add extra features to the book.

 

Stretch Goal #1 - 13 000 $

 

 

  • approx. 500 copies: I will be able to add a custom dust jacket for the URBAN SAINTS book. Every contributor will be able to choose the photograph that is printed on the cover from the overall selection, included in the book.

 

Stretch Goal #1 - 20 000 $

 

 

  • approx. 750 copies:  Additional to the custom dust jacket, I will add a customized A2 poster, printed on high-quality photo paper. Every contributor will be able to choose the photograph that is printed on the cover and the poster from the overall selection, included in the book.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

The success of this campaign relies entirely on your contributions and support and if the intended figure is achieved I will do everything I can to make sure that the final product will be as awesome as the people that have helped me get here.

I will personally overview the print process and finishing procedures, I will personally sign, hand-package and ship every copy, to make sure that everything is carried out the right way.

For the past five years, I have been able to reach over 120 photos in the series. And since I really want to display each and every one of them as a standalone piece of art, this made me decide on the number of the photos that will be included in the book. If this campaign is a success, I will make a second volume of this Project in the future with the next batch of photos.

 

Other Ways You Can Help Me

 

Don't hesitate to use the Indiegogo share tools and forward this to everyone that in your opinion will be interested and intrigued by this book. 

 

 

I sincerely thank you from the bottom of my heart for the support, not only in sharing and contributing but also to those of you who were with me for all these years.

 

URBAN SAINTS References

 

I have been very fortunate to be able to discuss the photographs with many inspiring and interesting people.

In 2013 URBAN SAINTS was featured in the Art Takes Miami Exhibition. 

in 2014, the project was part of the See Me Art Exhibition in Times Square, New York.

URBAN SAINTS has been featured in programs on Bulgarian National Television, TV7, Programata.bg, VICE, Boyscout Magazine and many other mediums.  You can find some of the materials listed below. 

  • https://www.vbox7.com/play:51f5d2f2b4&start...
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gaqfWh5yk7U
  • http://www.momichetataotgrada.com/article/stefa...
  • http://programata.bg/?p=174&l=1&c=1&amp...
  • http://woman.hotnews.bg/n/zhenska-krasota-+-gra...
  • http://jenite.bg/%D0%9C%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%80...

 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Реализирането на фотокнигата ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ зависи изцяло от броя на предварителните заявки, направени в сайта на Indiegogo. 

При достигане на зададената цел, обявена в началото на страницата, проектът се счита за успешен и след изтичане на зададения срок, печатът и разпространението на книгата могат да бъдат осъществени. 

Ако зададената цел не бъде достигната, парите, платени от всеки, подкрепил проекта, ще бъдат изцяло възстановени.

От зададените опции в дясно можете да направите своя избор и да подкрепите реализацията на проекта по предпочитания от Вас начин.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Какво е ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ?

 

Здравейте, аз съм Стефан Василев, графичен дизайнер и страстен фотограф. Винаги съм се вдъхновявал от красотата и нейния личен израз и съм вярвал, че всеки от нас притежава това специално качество, което въздейства и ни свързва с хората около нас.

 

Това е моят опит да уловя това.

 

 

ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ е серия от портретни фотографии, които започнах през 2012 г. Идеята ми беше да срещна и да заснема красиви и вдъхновяващи дами по специфичен и иконичен начин, който не само да покаже тяхната харизматичност и качества, но и да привлека внимание към красотата на заобикалящата ни градска архитектура.

 

Тези кадри са много специални за мен и са една от причините въобще да се захвана с фотография. Покрай тях получих възможността да контактувам със страхотни хора, да създам дълготрайни приятелства, да открия красиви и вдъхновяващи места и като цяло да съм в центъра на едно невероятно преживяване.

 

 

Професията ми е графичен дизайн и брандинг и винаги винаги съм се възхищавал на въздействаща фотография. Преди няколко години, пет по-точно, успях да се сдобия с приличен фотоапарат и това постави началото на моето пътуване в тази необятна сфера.

Серията ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ беше моят пръв опит да създам нещо с история и цялостна специфична тема. И сега, пет години по-късно, дойде моментът да вдъхна живот на този проект и да го развия от онлайн албум в реален жив предмет, който всеки може да вземе в ръцете си.

Това е моя дългогодишна мечта и с Вашата безценна подкрепа, искам да създам нещо, което да бъде подобаващ израз на една изключително важна част от моя личен и артистичен път.

 

Книгата

 

 

Целта на тази кампания е създам уникално и красиво представяне на проекта под формата на настолна фотокнига.

Моето желание е тя да бъде висококачествен продукт, който подобаващо да показва красотата на всяка една от снимките. Не искам да направя книгата прекалена малка, прекалено тънка или с други думи да е нещо, което просто „става“. Моето желание е това да бъде луксозно и класно издание. Висококачествена хартия, твърди корици и размер, който да позволи на всеки, който я разлисти да усети максимално красотата на всеки кадър.

 

Книгата ще бъда налична на посочената цена само и единствено през кампанията в Indiegogo .

 

 

Технически характеристики :

  • Размер: A4 (210/297mm)
  • Брой страници: 128
  • Висококачествена твърда корица
  • Брой фотографии: 60
  • Хартия за тялото: Chrome White Paper 170g/sqm
  • Дебелина на корицата: 2.5 mm

 

Парите ще бъдат използвани за печат, довършителни работи, опаковане, транспорт, разплащане с моделите и не на последно място организиране на парти, на което мога да се приветствам всички, които са ме подкрепили в реализирането на тази моя мечта (и всеки, който иска просто да дойде за да каже „Здравей“). 

Ако зададената финансова цел на проекта не бъде постигната, сумите преведени от всеки, подкрепил кампанията, ще бъдат възстановени изцяло .

Доставката на територията на България е безплатна. Доставката за всяка друга държава е зададена според цената на Български Национални Пощи.

 

Пакети

 

THANK YOU Pack - 5 $

 

 

Този пакет се представлява ръкописно благодарствено електронно писмо от мен.

Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата

 

POSTCARD Pack - 10 $

 

 

Този пакет включва ръкописно благодарствено електронно писмо и едно (1) подписано копие пощенска картичка ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ със снимка по Ваш избор.

Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата

 

POSTER Pack - 15 $

 

 

Този пакет включва ръкописно благодарствено електронно писмо, едно (1) подписано копие пощенска картичка ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ със снимка по Ваш избор и един (1) подписан плакат ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ със снимка по Ваш избор.

  • Посочената цена е валидна само по време на Indiegogo кампанията.

Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата.

 

URBAN SAINTS Pack - 27 $

 

 

Този пакет включва ръкописно благодарствено електронно писмо, едно (1) подписано копие пощенска картичка ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ със снимка по Ваш избор и едно (1) подписано копие от фотокнигата ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ.

  • Посочената цена е валидна само по време на Indiegogo кампанията. 

Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата.

 

GIFT Pack - 52 $

 

 

Този пакет включва ръкописно благодарствено електронно писмо, две (2) подписано копия пощенска картичка ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ със снимка по Ваш избор и две (2) подписани копия от фотокнигата ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ.

  • Посочената цена е валидна само по време на Indiegogo кампанията. Стандартната цена след завършване на кампанията ще бъде 32$.

Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата.

 

FAIR Pack - 125 $

 

 

Този пакет включва пет (5) подписани копия от фотокнигата ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ.

  • Посочената цена е валидна само по време на Indiegogo кампанията. Стандартната цена след завършване на кампанията ще бъде 32$.

Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата.

 

BOOKSTORE Pack - 245 $

 

 

Този пакет включва десет (10) подписани копия от фотокнигата ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ.

  • Посочената цена е валидна само по време на Indiegogo кампанията. Стандартната цена след завършване на кампанията ще бъде 32$.

Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата.

 

Допълнителни цели

 

Минималния тираж, предназначен за тази кампания е 250 копия.

В допълнение към тях са планирани две допълнителни финансови цели, които ще ми дадат възможност да добавя допълнителни екстри към книгата.

 

Допълнителна цел #1 - 13 000 $

 

 

  • прибл. 500 копия – Към книгата ще може да бъде добавена допълнителна супер-обложка към тиража на ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ. Всеки, подкрепил проекта и избрал, пакет, включващ книгата, ще може лично да избере снимката за тази допълнителна обложка.

 

Допълнителна цел #1 - 20 000 $

 

 

  • прибл. 750 копия – В допълнение към супер-обложката, ще имам възможност да добавя плакат с размер А2, отпечатан на висококачествена хартия. Всеки, подкрепил проекта и избрал, пакет, включващ книгата, ще може лично да избере снимката за този плакат.

 

Рискове и предизвикателства

 

Успехът на тази кампания зависи изцяло от Вашата подкрепа и ако крайната цел бъде постигната, ще направя всичко по силите си, за да се уверя, че крайния продукт е подобаващо качествен и въздействащ, както всеки един от Вас, помогнали ми да стигна до тук.

Лично ще присъствам на печатния процес и довършителните работи, лично ще подпиша, опаковам и изпратя всяко едно копие, за да се уверя, че всичко е изпълнено по най-качествения възможен начин.

През последните 5 години имах удоволствието да направя над 120 снимки от тази поредица. Желанието ми да представя всяка една от тях по най-добрия възможен начин ме накара да се спра на общия брой кадри, поместени в книгата. При успех на кампанията, желанието ми е в бъдеще да издам и втори том от същата поредица, изпълнен със следващата порция красиви фотографии.

 

Други начини, по които можете да ме подкрепите

 

Не се колебайте да използвате опциите за споделяне в сайта и да препратите тази информация до всеки, който според Вас би се заинтригувал от тази книга. 

 

 

Най-искрено благодаря от все сърце, не само на споделилите и подкрепили кампанията, но и на всички, които са до мен през цялото това време.

 

ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ в медиите

 

Благодарен съм за възможността да обсъждам този проект с много интересни и вдъхновяващи хора.

През 2013 г. ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ беше част от изложбата Art Takes Miami.

През 2014, проектът беше представен като част от събитието See Me Art Exhibition на Таймс Скуеър, Ню Йорк.

ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ е бил представян в програми по Българската Национална Телевизия, ТВ7, Programata.bg, VICE, списание Boyscout и много други медии. Можете да се запознаете с част от материалите по-долу.

  • https://www.vbox7.com/play:51f5d2f2b4&start...
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gaqfWh5yk7U
  • http://www.momichetataotgrada.com/article/stefa...
  • http://programata.bg/?p=174&l=1&c=1&amp...
  • http://woman.hotnews.bg/n/zhenska-krasota-+-gra...
  • http://jenite.bg/%D0%9C%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%80...

ЗА ОПИСАНИЕ НА БЪЛГАРСКИ ЕЗИК - МОЛЯ ВИЖТЕ ПО-ДОЛУ
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
What is URBAN SAINTS?
 

 
URBAN SAINTS is a series of portrait photographs that I started in 2012. The idea was to meet and photograph beautiful inspiring women in a very specific iconic way, that not only showcases their charisma and personality but also draws attention to the beauty of urban architecture.
These photos are very near and dear to my heart and in a way are the main reason I ever got involved in photography in the first place. It has given me the opportunity to interact with awesome people, create cool and lasting friendships, find inspiring and beautiful places and overall has been an amazing experience.
 

 
My professional background is graphic design and branding and I had always had great passion and admiration for compelling photography. A few years ago, 5 to be exact, I was able to get my hands on a decent camera and so my journey into this unlimited area of inspiration began. 
The URBAN SAINTS photo series was my first major attempt at creating something with a back-story and an overall specific theme. This has been a dream of mine for a long time and I finally decided to give this a try and with your precious help, I can achieve something that will be a fitting manifestation of something very important in my artistic and personal life.
 

The Book
 

 
The aim of this campaign is to create a unique and beautiful showcase in the form of a coffee-table photography book.
I want to create a very high-quality item and a book that does justice to the beauty that is portrayed in each of the photographs. I didn't want to make it too small, too flimsy and basically have something that will "just do for now". I wanted to make a classy and exquisite publication. High-quality paper, high-quality hardcover, and a size that lets the viewers take in all of the beauty and expression of each individual photograph.
 
The book will be available for the listed price only during the length of the Indiegogo campaign.
 

 
These are the technical details of the book:

Size: A4 (210/297mm)
Number of pages: 128
High-quality hardcover
Number of photographs: 60
Body paper: Chrome White Paper 170g/sqm
Hardcover: 2.5 mm

 
The money will be used print production, finishing details, packaging, shipping costs, model royalties and last, but not least, arranging the launch party where I can meet everyone that has helped me turn this dream into reality (and also everyone that can and wants to come and say Hi). 
If the funding goal is not met, every backer will be refunded.
Shipment within Bulgaria is free. Shipment to the rest of the world is priced according to Bulgarian Post Pricing.

 
Rewards
 
THANK YOU Pack - 5 $
 

 
This reward consists of a handwritten THANK YOU email from me to you.
Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book.
 
POSTCARD Pack - 10 $
 

 
This reward consists of a handwritten THANK YOU email and a signed copy of the URBAN SAINTS postcard with a photograph of your choice. 
Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book.
 
POSTER Pack - 15 $
 

 
This reward consists of a handwritten THANK YOU email, a signed copy of the URBAN SAINTS postcard with a photograph of your choice and a signed URBAN SAINTS poster witha photograph of your choice.
The listed price of the book will be available during the Indigogo campaign only. 
Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book. 
 
URBAN SAINTS Pack - 27 $
 

 
This reward consists of a handwritten THANK YOU email, a signed copy of the URBAN SAINTS postcard with a photograph of your choice and a signed copy of the URBAN SAINTS photography book.
The listed price of the book will be available during the Indigogo campaign only. 
Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book. 
 
GIFT Pack - 52 $
 

 
This reward consists of a handwritten THANK YOU email, two signed copies of the URBAN SAINTS postcard with the photograph of your choice and two signed copies of the URBAN SAINTS photography book.
Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book. 
 
FAIR Pack - 125 $
 

 
This reward consists of 5 (five) signed copies of the URBAN SAINTS photography book.
The listed price of the book will be available during the Indigogo campaign only. Regular retail price will be 32$.
Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book. 
 
BOOKSTORE Pack - 245 $
 

 
This reward consists of 10 (ten) signed copies of the URBAN SAINTS photography book.
The listed price of the book will be available during the Indigogo campaign only. Regular retail price will be 32$.
Your name will also be included in the THANK YOU section in the back of the book. 
 
Stretch Goals
 
The original print run, that is set up for this campaign is 250 copies.
Additional to that I have planned a couple of extra goals/milestones that in terms of printing costs will allow me to add extra features to the book.
 
Stretch Goal #1 - 13 000 $
 

 
approx. 500 copies: I will be able to add a custom dust jacket for the URBAN SAINTS book. Every contributor will be able to choose the photograph that is printed on the cover from the overall selection, included in the book.
 
Stretch Goal #1 - 20 000 $
 

 
approx. 750 copies:  Additional to the custom dust jacket, I will add a customized A2 poster, printed on high-quality photo paper. Every contributor will be able to choose the photograph that is printed on the cover and the poster from the overall selection, included in the book.
 

Risks & Challenges
 
The success of this campaign relies entirely on your contributions and support and if the intended figure is achieved I will do everything I can to make sure that the final product will be as awesome as the people that have helped me get here.
I will personally overview the print process and finishing procedures, I will personally sign, hand-package and ship every copy, to make sure that everything is carried out the right way.
For the past five years, I have been able to reach over 120 photos in the series. And since I really want to display each and every one of them as a standalone piece of art, this made me decide on the number of the photos that will be included in the book. If this campaign is a success, I will make a second volume of this Project in the future with the next batch of photos.
 

Other Ways You Can Help Me
 
Don't hesitate to use the Indiegogo share tools and forward this to everyone that in your opinion will be interested and intrigued by this book. 
 

 
I sincerely thank you from the bottom of my heart for the support, not only in sharing and contributing but also to those of you who were with me for all these years.
 
URBAN SAINTS References
 
I have been very fortunate to be able to discuss the photographs with many inspiring and interesting people.
In 2013 URBAN SAINTS was featured in the Art Takes Miami Exhibition. 
in 2014, the project was part of the See Me Art Exhibition in Times Square, New York.
URBAN SAINTS has been featured in programs on Bulgarian National Television, TV7, Programata.bg, VICE, Boyscout Magazine and many other mediums.  You can find some of the materials listed below. 

https://www.vbox7.com/play:51f5d2f2b4&start...
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gaqfWh5yk7U
http://www.momichetataotgrada.com/article/stefa...
http://programata.bg/?p=174&l=1&c=1&amp...
http://woman.hotnews.bg/n/zhenska-krasota-+-gra...
http://jenite.bg/%D0%9C%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%80...

 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Реализирането на фотокнигата ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ зависи изцяло от броя на предварителните заявки, направени в сайта на Indiegogo. 
При достигане на зададената цел, обявена в началото на страницата, проектът се счита за успешен и след изтичане на зададения срок, печатът и разпространението на книгата могат да бъдат осъществени. 
Ако зададената цел не бъде достигната, парите, платени от всеки, подкрепил проекта, ще бъдат изцяло възстановени.
От зададените опции в дясно можете да направите своя избор и да подкрепите реализацията на проекта по предпочитания от Вас начин.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 

Какво е ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ?
 
Здравейте, аз съм Стефан Василев, графичен дизайнер и страстен фотограф. Винаги съм се вдъхновявал от красотата и нейния личен израз и съм вярвал, че всеки от нас притежава това специално качество, което въздейства и ни свързва с хората около нас.
 
Това е моят опит да уловя това.
 

 
ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ е серия от портретни фотографии, които започнах през 2012 г. Идеята ми беше да срещна и да заснема красиви и вдъхновяващи дами по специфичен и иконичен начин, който не само да покаже тяхната харизматичност и качества, но и да привлека внимание към красотата на заобикалящата ни градска архитектура.
 
Тези кадри са много специални за мен и са една от причините въобще да се захвана с фотография. Покрай тях получих възможността да контактувам със страхотни хора, да създам дълготрайни приятелства, да открия красиви и вдъхновяващи места и като цяло да съм в центъра на едно невероятно преживяване.
 

 
Професията ми е графичен дизайн и брандинг и винаги винаги съм се възхищавал на въздействаща фотография. Преди няколко години, пет по-точно, успях да се сдобия с приличен фотоапарат и това постави началото на моето пътуване в тази необятна сфера.
Серията ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ беше моят пръв опит да създам нещо с история и цялостна специфична тема. И сега, пет години по-късно, дойде моментът да вдъхна живот на този проект и да го развия от онлайн албум в реален жив предмет, който всеки може да вземе в ръцете си.
Това е моя дългогодишна мечта и с Вашата безценна подкрепа, искам да създам нещо, което да бъде подобаващ израз на една изключително важна част от моя личен и артистичен път.
 


Книгата
 

 
Целта на тази кампания е създам уникално и красиво представяне на проекта под формата на настолна фотокнига.
Моето желание е тя да бъде висококачествен продукт, който подобаващо да показва красотата на всяка една от снимките. Не искам да направя книгата прекалена малка, прекалено тънка или с други думи да е нещо, което просто „става“. Моето желание е това да бъде луксозно и класно издание. Висококачествена хартия, твърди корици и размер, който да позволи на всеки, който я разлисти да усети максимално красотата на всеки кадър.
 
Книгата ще бъда налична на посочената цена само и единствено през кампанията в Indiegogo .
 

 
Технически характеристики :

Размер: A4 (210/297mm)
Брой страници: 128
Висококачествена твърда корица
Брой фотографии: 60
Хартия за тялото: Chrome White Paper 170g/sqm
Дебелина на корицата: 2.5 mm

 
Парите ще бъдат използвани за печат, довършителни работи, опаковане, транспорт, разплащане с моделите и не на последно място организиране на парти, на което мога да се приветствам всички, които са ме подкрепили в реализирането на тази моя мечта (и всеки, който иска просто да дойде за да каже „Здравей“). 
Ако зададената финансова цел на проекта не бъде постигната, сумите преведени от всеки, подкрепил кампанията, ще бъдат възстановени изцяло .
Доставката на територията на България е безплатна. Доставката за всяка друга държава е зададена според цената на Български Национални Пощи.


 
Пакети
 
THANK YOU Pack - 5 $
 

 
Този пакет се представлява ръкописно благодарствено електронно писмо от мен.
Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата
 
POSTCARD Pack - 10 $
 

 
Този пакет включва ръкописно благодарствено електронно писмо и едно (1) подписано копие пощенска картичка ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ със снимка по Ваш избор.
Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата
 
POSTER Pack - 15 $
 

 
Този пакет включва ръкописно благодарствено електронно писмо, едно (1) подписано копие пощенска картичка ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ със снимка по Ваш избор и един (1) подписан плакат ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ със снимка по Ваш избор.

Посочената цена е валидна само по време на Indiegogo кампанията. 

Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата.
 
URBAN SAINTS Pack - 27 $
 

 
Този пакет включва ръкописно благодарствено електронно писмо, едно (1) подписано копие пощенска картичка ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ със снимка по Ваш избор и едно (1) подписано копие от фотокнигата ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ.

Посочената цена е валидна само по време на Indiegogo кампанията. 

Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата.
 
GIFT Pack - 52 $
 

 
Този пакет включва ръкописно благодарствено електронно писмо, две (2) подписано копия пощенска картичка ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ със снимка по Ваш избор и две (2) подписани копия от фотокнигата ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ.

Посочената цена е валидна само по време на Indiegogo кампанията. Стандартната цена след завършване на кампанията ще бъде 32$.

Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата.
 
FAIR Pack - 125 $
 

 
Този пакет включва пет (5) подписани копия от фотокнигата ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ.

Посочената цена е валидна само по време на Indiegogo кампанията. Стандартната цена след завършване на кампанията ще бъде 32$.

Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата.
 
BOOKSTORE Pack - 245 $
 

 
Този пакет включва десет (10) подписани копия от фотокнигата ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ.

Посочената цена е валидна само по време на Indiegogo кампанията. Стандартната цена след завършване на кампанията ще бъде 32$.

Също така името Ви ще бъде включено в списъка с подкрепили проекта в края на книгата.
 
Допълнителни цели
 
Минималния тираж, предназначен за тази кампания е 250 копия.
В допълнение към тях са планирани две допълнителни финансови цели, които ще ми дадат възможност да добавя допълнителни екстри към книгата.
 
Допълнителна цел #1 - 13 000 $
 

 
прибл. 500 копия – Към книгата ще може да бъде добавена допълнителна супер-обложка към тиража на ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ. Всеки, подкрепил проекта и избрал, пакет, включващ книгата, ще може лично да избере снимката за тази допълнителна обложка.
 
Допълнителна цел #1 - 20 000 $
 

 
прибл. 750 копия – В допълнение към супер-обложката, ще имам възможност да добавя плакат с размер А2, отпечатан на висококачествена хартия. Всеки, подкрепил проекта и избрал, пакет, включващ книгата, ще може лично да избере снимката за този плакат.
 


Рискове и предизвикателства
 
Успехът на тази кампания зависи изцяло от Вашата подкрепа и ако крайната цел бъде постигната, ще направя всичко по силите си, за да се уверя, че крайния продукт е подобаващо качествен и въздействащ, както всеки един от Вас, помогнали ми да стигна до тук.
Лично ще присъствам на печатния процес и довършителните работи, лично ще подпиша, опаковам и изпратя всяко едно копие, за да се уверя, че всичко е изпълнено по най-качествения възможен начин.
През последните 5 години имах удоволствието да направя над 120 снимки от тази поредица. Желанието ми да представя всяка една от тях по най-добрия възможен начин ме накара да се спра на общия брой кадри, поместени в книгата. При успех на кампанията, желанието ми е в бъдеще да издам и втори том от същата поредица, изпълнен със следващата порция красиви фотографии.
 


Други начини, по които можете да ме подкрепите
 
Не се колебайте да използвате опциите за споделяне в сайта и да препратите тази информация до всеки, който според Вас би се заинтригувал от тази книга. 
 

 
Най-искрено благодаря от все сърце, не само на споделилите и подкрепили кампанията, но и на всички, които са до мен през цялото това време.
 
ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ в медиите
 
Благодарен съм за възможността да обсъждам този проект с много интересни и вдъхновяващи хора.
През 2013 г. ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ беше част от изложбата Art Takes Miami.
През 2014, проектът беше представен като част от събитието See Me Art Exhibition на Таймс Скуеър, Ню Йорк.
ГРАДСКИ СВЕТИЦИ е бил представян в програми по Българската Национална Телевизия, ТВ7, Programata.bg, VICE, списание Boyscout и много други медии. Можете да се запознаете с част от материалите по-долу.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gaqfWh5yk7U
http://www.momichetataotgrada.com/article/stefa...
http://programata.bg/?p=174&l=1&c=1&amp...
http://woman.hotnews.bg/n/zhenska-krasota-+-gra...
http://jenite.bg/%D0%9C%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%80...

story:
My name is Carlos Mario Argüello, I'm Colombian and this is my history.

4 years ago I started working with self-taught photography, I've never studied or taken any courses. I've read to followed my eye to into what to take pictures of.

This everything started while ago, I had the chance to have a camera in my hands and immediately I felt that I found myself.

The feeling at this moment moves into photography.

Part of this feeling into my missionary work took me 5 years, visiting the farmer trails and farms, joining them at the dinner table, at the same time I was just offering my whole to listen to what happened to each of them. Their pain, suffering, frustrations, happiness, their silences, those were the most vivid portraits I took. This is the reason why my soul now feels complete.

After the trip it keeps on my mind to bittersweet feeling of capturing what I felt and how I had to live. But also remains on me an enormous weight on my back, the weight of give and share What I experienced with the others, to show what I've seen before, to let my self show my inner battles, lots of them failed with some winnings , giving the people what I have to tell, what I secretly scream or keep silent, letting my sight show its point, my wounds and scars, my own words, my heartbeats, and my deepest soul.

For this I had to start with something, then I started working on my website but I felt I had to go even further, merging all my work into a book. This is why I need your help! I want to share the world all my experiences into a printed book, to improve my photographer career and spread knowledge to the world. You have two options if you want to help me to get my goal. First one: You go and navigate my entire website and then decide if you want to help me, donating at this site. Second: You feel free to share this dream of mine between your friends, family and related you think they could found my personal project as something interesting. All the money collected will be for releasing 1.000 book copys with 200 of my photography diaries. I will be greatful if you can support me. 

If you donate U$100 or more + shipping, you can  get 20% off the book, also a picture,  10 x 15 cm (0.39 x 5.9 inches) with a personal message on the back.

If you donate U$200 or more + shipping, you can  get 50% off the book, also a picture,  15 x 18 cm (5.9 x 7 inches) with a personal message on the back. Now if you are interesting a piece of art print in paper Hahnemühle FineArt, with measures  95 x 65 cm (37.4 x 25.6 inches)  it will be just six pieces and you can get one of those, you can get 20% off. 

If you donate U$500 or more  you can get  the book for free the hard box, with your name on the top of the box.  Also a picture  15 x 18 cm (5.9 x 7 inches) with a personal message on the back. Now if you are interesting a piece of art print in paper Hahnemühle FineArt, with measures  95 x 65 cm (37.4 x 25.6 inches)  it will be just six pieces and you can get one of those, you can get 40% off. 

In case i wont obtein the founds  i need,  i will have two options, first one is make a smaller amount of copys close to the 500 books, and the second one will print out original pieces, with a serial number and have an exposition. 

the photograph describes the perfection between what is outside and inside 

I need you to please spread my campaign with your friends, your family or people that you think will interest them my project,

and if you want support me, please  click and donate my cause

 

THIS IS MY WEBSITE

www.QiaQtl.com

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you. Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.  Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution? story:
Hello everyone. I am Slava Mishchenko.  A photographer from Ukraine.

I am here to publish a book of a collection of my photographs.

My photographs are not simply about a mechanical click of a camera or choosing the right position for filming and they do not just depict a story.
My photos are a piece of my heart;  they encompass my passion and love for life.


In the book which I would like to publish, one will find collected stories about the snails, ants, ladybirds, butterflies, lizards and other insects which I photograph.


I am an old-fashioned man, which means I prefer good quality books to any other modern gadgets. Therefore, my A4 /210*297mm/ book will be printed on high quality paper with a matte finish, a beautiful hard cover and 240 pages of inspiration.


A true pleasure to peruse, it is also a wonderful gift idea for your loved ones.


Join my campaign and become an owner of your own book!

With love to all of you ... Slava

http://vmishchenko.com/#gallery

Important Notice About Shipping Costs!

Please add $21 to the perk $29 "You own the book" and to the perk $50 "Signed copy of the book" when the book is published. I'll send an update. Thank you!

story:
If you are wondering why finance a new website where to view pussy on a paying basis, the following may help to understand why.

At first glance the idea may seem unoriginal and over-inflationed , but if so it’s only because usually the main point-of-view is porn, and its market is already multi-diversified in its repeated boredom.

If you look into some of the actual websites I’m pretty sure you know what I mean: set of 80-100 photos where the same pose is repeated many times, just to “make quantity”. Apparently, it looks like to be a very generous update, but if you mind it, there are just maybe a dozen of poses, multiplied by ten.
I don’t know you, but personally I’m tired of it.

More than this, there is the matter of the image itself.

My idea came to me after a few talks with my friends due to the type of photography I engage with, and that is to combine women’s beauty with natural/artificial surrounding landscape beauty and/or to sensationalize my photography by adding TRUE and REAL special effects by employing physics and optics as opposed to computer aided untrue special effects.

OK, I know what are you thinking… I am well aware that to attempt the above requires a masterful use of the camera however, I am a 35mm-born-photographer, when computers were x86 and Adobe only catered for cinematographic production: Movies only or Super High-Grade Magazines.

For the younger reader, I am referring to a time with disc-combinator phones, when a photograph had to be taken almost perfect from the moment it was clicked since following margins of correction and alteration were minimal and extremely laborious, i.e. not cost or time effective, and with uncertain final outcome.

Obviously nowadays Photoshop allows us to show any given woman on the back of a blue dragon flying in the sky or deeper space of a faraway planet whilst being surrounded by an iridescent aura... Ok, fine, but where’s the BEAUTY OF THE ACTUAL PHOTO in all of that? How is the actual beauty of the woman-model enhanced? Or the beauty of the surroundings/landscape? It’s ALL post-production, soul-less and unreal computer graphics. That’s just CGI, at last Boris Vallejo style images, not for sure beauty.

A further example can be seen in existing websites which show breathtakingly beautiful women (or porn-stars) posing in a photographic studio or a generic location which adds to the impersonal and soul-less substance of the photograph.

The actual photo of the drop-dead-gorgeous model in a sterile studio or generic impersonal location may still turn out to be a beautiful viewing, but how about showing the heavenly beautiful woman under a natural waterfall? Or by the sea, or in one of the endless show-stopping natural landscape beautiful locations to be found just about anywhere in Italy or some other Country?

Shortly: you want to see “pussy”? Fine, the web is rich of that! You want to see an amazing photo with that girl you've seen on a pornsite? Come to my site, then!

The above combination of breath-taking female beauty immersed in natural landscape breath-taking beauty is behind the idea of my website in order to create an endless TRUE self-enhancing aesthetic photographic effect.

This can be achieved also bringing the model on some spectacular “man made” construction… I have a lot of ideas about this, you’ll be surprised how much the combination girl+place can be awesome!

I would like to combine images produced in a studio setting, artistic ones included, of the ultimate female beauty with the ultimate natural (or artificial) landscape surroundings beauty.

Years ago professional internationally acclaimed photographers such as Franco Fontana produced truly marvelous photographs.

Magazines such as Playboy published his masterpieces and they always added REAL AND TRUE value to both the image and the magazine.

My photographic inspiration comes from those imagines and techniques and I further built on them.

At present, I take photographs for personal interest and photographic passion but following my talks with my friends we realized that the nude-art sector lacks the quality and true inspirational added value which was present some years ago because some professional photographers were active and very talented in their photographic production.

There appears to be a niche in the market that would benefit and accommodate the need for true beauty artistic combination of the nude-art  type. And I strongly believe that consumers of such nude-art  type are many and global but the current market doesn’t provide for it.

As they say: IF YOU BUILD IT, THEY WILL COME! :-)

Currently the nude art market (but practically any other market) mainly targets QUANTITY. Photocopied images repeating itself in boring, uninspiring and soul-less combinations.

I truly believe the time has come to go back in order to retrieve and revive REAL QUALITY and REAL IMAGE, PHOTOGRAPHY.

By producing TRUE photographs, BEAUTIFUL photographs that do not heavily rely on post-production editing and enhancement which only take the real soul the photograph out and ultimately kill the photograph one is able to truly take photography to its intended purpose.

Nowadays it’s all and only about computer aided post-production techniques and software, and virtually nothing of the ORIGINAL TRUE and REAL beauty, and photography skills and soul. Such post-production enhancement techniques and software only accomplish the task of rendering the image unnatural, unobtainable via means of true and real combination of beauty and realphotographic skills and inspiration.

Sadly, due to the increasing computer-world versus the real world, in order to accomplish what I have described so far it takes considerable financial investment:

About 5,000 € are needed in order to set up a company based in Switzerland, as I’ll move there very soon.

It would take around 15,000 € to create the website hosting, not based in Italy. This is for a too long series of reasons to be explained here, but shortly the amount is so high because the project requires a very complex set up in order to manage images, videos, updates, databases and mainly the volume of traffic that such a website will be able to generate and handle.
In order for the above environment to be stable and reliable one needs to rely on infrastructures that are not linked to Italian whimsical politicians legislation and/or unnecessarily complicated and user-unfriendly Italian providers.

Then, due to the reason the website will be not immediately operative, I have to consider around 20,000 € for the expenses management during this “work-in-progress” time.

As you can see I have done my maths and research to establish viability and feasibility of the website I am hoping to produce.

However, once the containing structure is reliably and safely designed and created, one has to provide its content, and it must be valid and true value content since no one would ever wish to buy a website membership to access 4 women-models, each of whom are in a couple of settings/locations.

The true high value image content to be offered envisages at least 30 (or more) models, each of whom would be photographed in at least three or four settings/locations.

An initial financial research including famous and new entry models indicates not less than 50,000 €. This is an all-inclusive budget for with regard to shooting costs (models fee included).

Initially I would look after all the production needs and all their spin offs, from the initial click to the final editing. I already have all the technology required however, for good measure, I also envisage that adding 10,000 € to the above budget would take care of miscellaneous needs and/or unforeseen circumstances which may arise as the production is in the making.
On other hands, if everything goes fine, this amount would go for more models.

Therefore the actual all inclusive budget would be 100,000 € and the project could start from the foundations up relying on a solid plan.

The time scale needed to produce what I have described so far, and with a end of December 2017, start is between two or three months from technical production of the website and content/shooting preparations and online materials. With such time scale a summer 2018 online operational inauguration is envisaged.

Very, very, very important! For reasons like professional morality, ethic and backers respect, I’ve chosen the “all-or-nothing” formula, because without that money the project will be postponed on no predictable basis. This is not correct for all of you. So, if I will collect all the money I need, the project will go on as planned, otherwise you’ll get your money back.

story:
Why I Do What I Do

While I love photographing in Boston, I am eager to expand my reach throughout the ENTIRE country. If you are a peaceful patriot who believes in the Constitution, then I want to support YOU.

What I Need

My next goal is to travel to Austin, TX on 9/22/2018 in support of Patriot Prayer. 

I have set a modest goal of $500 to hopefully include round-trip airfare, accommodations for 1 nights, meals, misc. travel expenses (such as parking and public transit), and a small emergency fund.

The Impact

By contributing to this campaign, you support a young, up-and-coming patriotic photographer who will never allow the violent far-left to stop her from showcasing peaceful, freedom-loving patriots the way they DESERVE to be seen.

Please visit https://www.facebook.com/Liberty-Photos-by-Grac... to see more examples of my work.

Risks & Challenges

Life happens and emergencies happen. If, for any reason out of my control, I have to back out of this event, I will use the funds raised in this campaign for similar events in the future (at least 50 miles from my home region).

Other Ways You Can Help

Sharing is caring! Even if you can't donate monetarily, just one share can reach dozens of people!

Much love,

-Grace

story:
The idea for FilterSpecs came about from wanting to see the world the way I view it through my camera. One day, while changing the filters on my camera, I realized I could get the same view if I had a way to wear them. Also sunglasses just never seemed to provide the right tint or shade I wanted. So, why not design a pair of frames that could accept photography filters! The result was FilterSpecs. 


 
FilterSpecs allow you the freedom to enhance your perspective by customizing the way you want to see the world. Feeling sad? Throw on a pair of amber filters. Bothered by that pesky glare. Polarizing filters should do the trick! Sad about that glare? Why not amber filters and polarizers! It’s really that simple. You can stack filters to get darker or lighter variations of colors. You can Mix Colors. You can get two variable neutral density filters and have a tint level you can adjust to changing light conditions. Want the best optical quality possible? With FilterSpecs the sky is the limit with hundreds of filters on the market.
 
 All filters shipped with rewards will have optical grade, polycarbonate resin, shatter resistant lenses for safety purposes. The frames will be made of injection molded thermoplastic. All frames will come with a black microfiber cloth bag and two 58mm Neutral Density ND8 filters.The larger rewards will come with a pair of 6 filter wallets holding a pair of red,green,blue,yellow and orange 58mm filters and a space to store the ND8 filters. 
 
Don't have 58mm lenses? Step up/down adapter rings are very inexpensive and you can then use them for the filters provided or use them to mount your size filters to the frames.
Close up of ND8 Filter and 58mm threaded frame insert
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

last three prototypes in Black, White and Red.

The Indiegogo fund level is the break even point for me on this project. As you can imagine photography components and deciding to do molding and assembly in the USA is not inexpensive but with your support I’ve worked to make the reward at an affordable price. 

Many, many hours have been spent designing, prototyping and iterating FilterSpecs to a point where I feel they are ready for Indiegogo. FilterSpecs are Patent Pending. The molding house is ready to cut the molds as soon as I place the order. The threaded aluminum inserts that mount in the frames have already had an evaluation run and are ready for the production run. I have full time resources for assembly and shipping of the rewards. After successful funding I plan to start shipping rewards within two months with the last reward going out no later than three months. And of course, I will keep everyone up to date on build status, assembly and shipping. 

Please note: For all reward options shipping is free for US addresses. For international rewards please add the additional amount listed on each reward to your total pledge.  Please indicate desired frame color choice during payment submission. If no color is indicated the default color will be Black Boogaloo.

Warning: Filterspecs may not block UV light depending on what filters you have in place. Don't stare at the sun silly.

 I hope you enjoy FilterSpecs as much as I have.

These aren't sunglasses, they're FilterSpecs.

Yours Truly!
My Buddy Tim!
