story:
Metropolight

In 2015, I walked over 3600 kilometres through some of the world's most metropolitan areas, photographing people in cities such as New York, Tokyo, Hong Kong, Shanghai, Sydney, London or Seoul. Despite how physically close to each other people in large cities work, commute and live together, the general attitude among its populations has increasingly been a one of hesitation and reluctance. I believe this is because cities alienate its people. The modern city needs to be a functional and well-organised space. At it's core, it is rooted in reason and factual knowledge. As an effect, the emotional concerns of people living cities are often pushed aside and deemed as distractive to the smooth functioning of the city.

In this book, I wanted to explore the emotional charge, or lack thereof, of the 21st century metropolis. I am not interested in individual cities as much as I am intrigued by the ways the almost clinically sterile urban environment structures our lives and shapes our experience. Many of the photos in the book have been taken in business districts that exemplify spaces rooted in rationality and individual achievement.

The city exercises a homogenizing power over its people. The continuous shift towards a quantifiable and objective existence creates a tension in those who live in the city. The urban tendencies towards indifference and a reserved attitude are a manifest of a struggle to maintain personal space where individuals can harbour their unique and complex personalities. Hopefully, the book is a record of this struggle; of what the city moulds us into, and how we try to remain authentic to ourselves at the same time.

By funding this book, you will help to publish a project that explores the human efforts to maintain independence and a sense of self in spite of the urban pressures and the weight of history. 

The Author

I started photographing in 2012, while on an intermission from a degree in anthropology in London. The camera was a therapeutic tool at first, but quickly became a research instrument that I use to better understand myself, the cities we live in, and hopefully other people as well. 

My photographs were exhibited internationally (Poland, Czech Republic, Belgium, Japan) and printed in numerous magazines and newspapers. I teach street photography workshops and shoot behind-the-scenes photographs for a variety of production companies. At the moment, I have no interest in staging what I photograph.

I am also an international ambassador of Fujifilm's X-Pro2 camera aimed at street photographers. At the age of 25, I was the youngest among the 100 photographers selected by Fujifilm worldwide.

The Book

When I returned from the 8-months-long trip, a well-known Austrian photobook publishing house Kant offered to publish my photos as a book. We have turned to Indiegogo to reach an audience outside of the Austria and to gain more funds to ensure the book is exactly as desired by the author.

The funds collected through the campaign will allow us to spend more time at the printer's to ensure a high-quality print, and help us to partially fund the printing, binding, and cover material. 

                                             Limited Boxed Edition (with a signed print)

 

Extracts from the Foreword & Essay

FOREWORD

The city becomes an intimately familiar setting, which David understands well. He is able to pause a moment when five people in close proximity are each engaged in a different activity, each sealed shut in their own world, yet sharing a common space which forever connects their existences in a fleeting second. David Gaberle appears to control a photographed situation in three key ways: the composition of the shot, its multilayered narrative and its colour. - Petr Volf author & art critic

 

ESSAY

Things pass in front of them quickly like dynasties of mites, but they only capture their shadows. Their journey, however often it may cross the same stations and go past the same narrow corridors, is far from over. Each of them separately nurtures a guide, a spectre. For any passing wall or unexpected curvature of shapes could reopen that sidewalk, a space outside of daily machinery and a pocket of time outside of their precisely calibrated watch. The tired look that was worked by the city flow like a waterfall’s bedrock reignites with fervour. - Alex Jasiński poet & author.

 

Praise for Metropolight

Bravo. I don't really have anything to say, these are great photos. - Harry Gruyaert of Magnum Photos

I fell in love with this work. It's about light, shadows, urban landscapes. This is the photography I really love - of people in the landscape, who are not dominant. The colours are beautiful, gripping, and the book's going to inspire a lot of young photographers. - Antonín Kratochvíl photojournalist and co-founder of VII Photo Agency

This is a very well constructed book that contains some excellent photography. Metropolight will do well. - Michael Mack founder of Mack Books publishing company    

It’s hard to believe that the book's author is only twenty-six and has been taking photos for a little over five years. - Petr Volf author & art critic

A beautiful exploration of the anonymous nature of urban life through colour and light.    - George Georgiou photojournalist & documentary photographer.

 

                                                                      3 postcards.

 

Book Details

Metropolight: edition of 900 (including a limited boxed edition of 100)

Design: by Milan Nedvěd (MFA from Rhode Island School of Design, granted the Les Rencontres d'Arles 2016 Book Award, European Design Awards)

Photographs: approx. 37

Size: approx. 24x21 cm

Publication date: April 2017

The book will feature the names of everyone who helps to make the book possible by supporting this Indiegogo campaign.

Thank you for helping me in bringing this book to life.

Risks & Challenges

There are no risks to completing the book. I am asking for the part funding of the book and I will use my own savings to make up the rest. The rest of the publication's expenses are covered by Kant Publishers.
story_txt:
Metropolight
In 2015, I walked over 3600 kilometres through some of the world's most metropolitan areas, photographing people in cities such as New York, Tokyo, Hong Kong, Shanghai, Sydney, London or Seoul. Despite how physically close to each other people in large cities work, commute and live together, the general attitude among its populations has increasingly been a one of hesitation and reluctance. I believe this is because cities alienate its people. The modern city needs to be a functional and well-organised space. At it's core, it is rooted in reason and factual knowledge. As an effect, the emotional concerns of people living cities are often pushed aside and deemed as distractive to the smooth functioning of the city.

In this book, I wanted to explore the emotional charge, or lack thereof, of the 21st century metropolis. I am not interested in individual cities as much as I am intrigued by the ways the almost clinically sterile urban environment structures our lives and shapes our experience. Many of the photos in the book have been taken in business districts that exemplify spaces rooted in rationality and individual achievement.
The city exercises a homogenizing power over its people. The continuous shift towards a quantifiable and objective existence creates a tension in those who live in the city. The urban tendencies towards indifference and a reserved attitude are a manifest of a struggle to maintain personal space where individuals can harbour their unique and complex personalities. Hopefully, the book is a record of this struggle; of what the city moulds us into, and how we try to remain authentic to ourselves at the same time.

By funding this book, you will help to publish a project that explores the human efforts to maintain independence and a sense of self in spite of the urban pressures and the weight of history. 
The Author
I started photographing in 2012, while on an intermission from a degree in anthropology in London. The camera was a therapeutic tool at first, but quickly became a research instrument that I use to better understand myself, the cities we live in, and hopefully other people as well. 
My photographs were exhibited internationally (Poland, Czech Republic, Belgium, Japan) and printed in numerous magazines and newspapers. I teach street photography workshops and shoot behind-the-scenes photographs for a variety of production companies. At the moment, I have no interest in staging what I photograph.

I am also an international ambassador of Fujifilm's X-Pro2 camera aimed at street photographers. At the age of 25, I was the youngest among the 100 photographers selected by Fujifilm worldwide.
The Book

When I returned from the 8-months-long trip, a well-known Austrian photobook publishing house Kant offered to publish my photos as a book. We have turned to Indiegogo to reach an audience outside of the Austria and to gain more funds to ensure the book is exactly as desired by the author.
The funds collected through the campaign will allow us to spend more time at the printer's to ensure a high-quality print, and help us to partially fund the printing, binding, and cover material. 

                                             Limited Boxed Edition (with a signed print)
 
Extracts from the Foreword & Essay
FOREWORD
The city becomes an intimately familiar setting, which David understands well. He is able to pause a moment when five people in close proximity are each engaged in a different activity, each sealed shut in their own world, yet sharing a common space which forever connects their existences in a fleeting second. David Gaberle appears to control a photographed situation in three key ways: the composition of the shot, its multilayered narrative and its colour. - Petr Volf author & art critic

 
ESSAY
Things pass in front of them quickly like dynasties of mites, but they only capture their shadows. Their journey, however often it may cross the same stations and go past the same narrow corridors, is far from over. Each of them separately nurtures a guide, a spectre. For any passing wall or unexpected curvature of shapes could reopen that sidewalk, a space outside of daily machinery and a pocket of time outside of their precisely calibrated watch. The tired look that was worked by the city flow like a waterfall’s bedrock reignites with fervour. - Alex Jasiński poet & author.
 

Praise for Metropolight
Bravo. I don't really have anything to say, these are great photos. - Harry Gruyaert of Magnum Photos
I fell in love with this work. It's about light, shadows, urban landscapes. This is the photography I really love - of people in the landscape, who are not dominant. The colours are beautiful, gripping, and the book's going to inspire a lot of young photographers. - Antonín Kratochvíl photojournalist and co-founder of VII Photo Agency
This is a very well constructed book that contains some excellent photography. Metropolight will do well. - Michael Mack founder of Mack Books publishing company    
It’s hard to believe that the book's author is only twenty-six and has been taking photos for a little over five years. - Petr Volf author & art critic
A beautiful exploration of the anonymous nature of urban life through colour and light.    - George Georgiou photojournalist & documentary photographer.

story:
My Story

Hi,

My name is Kat and I'm a Photography graduate who has discovered a newfound inspiration in an unfortunate tragedy. I'd like to share a story with you about a dear friend I lost on June 22nd, 2012:

When I went to school for photography, I had the opportunity to meet one of the most wonderful people one could ever meet. His name was Brye. Brye wasn't exactly one of the most extroverted, loud people but he was one of the most gentle souls I ever came across. We bonded over photography classes and lunch breaks. We would share our photographic fears and our dreams for our future. I wanted to move to New York and he wanted to move to California. At the end of last year, he was able to move to California to be with his fiancee, Kim. When it was my birthday, Brye sent me a letter along with a drawing that contained two characters, one holding a balloon.

Once Brye moved to California, he became increasingly sick. He began to experience painful migraines to the point he was unable to walk. Unbeknownst to me, he had been suffering from Lupus ever since he was 16. On June 22nd, I was delivered some unfortunate news by Kim that Brye had passed away due to complications of Lupus. He was only 23.

My campaign is a photographic project I have labeled "The Purple Balloon Project". The color purple is associated with Lupus. When I heard this terrible news, I wanted to be able to help out. I felt inspired to pursue a project where I would be able to help out others suffering from Lupus with the hopes of a cure someday.

I would like to start a photographic series containing subjects holding a purple balloon in natural light. The purpose of this series is to raise awareness of Lupus and serve as an homage to my dear friend, Brye. This project will be a joint effort along with a documentary that will be produced by Brye's fiancee, Kim.

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to be able to bring "The Purple Balloon Project" to life, I am asking for help in funding some of the equipment to be able to photograph the best possible ideas. At the moment, the camera that I use presents some limitations for the type of project I would like to do. I am looking to begin shooting "The Purple Balloon Project" in August.

I'm asking for a funding fee of $5,000 to cover some of the following:

-Canon f/4 24-105 mm USM

Because this project is on a "Fixed" funding schedule, our goal of $5000 must be met in order to continue with this project. About 80% of the funding will be donated to the Lupus Foundation of America (Philadelphia Tri-State Chapter). Please help us get there. 
 
Alas, if our goal is not reached within 45 days, I will still pursue "The Purple Balloon Project" with my limited resources.
 
In exchange for your generosity, the following perks will be delivered to you via mail once the project is completed (please make sure you click on "Claim this Perk" and not just "Contribute" if you'd like a perk)
:
$5 - Personalized Thank You note via mail (unlimited)
$10 - Thank You note + 4x6 print (100 available)
$20 - Thank You note + 4x6 print + 5x7 print (50 available)
$50 - Thank You note + 4x6 print + 5x7 print + 8x10 print (30 available)
$100 - Thank You note + 4x6 print + 5x7 print + 2 8x10 prints (10 available)
$250 - Thank You note + 4x6 print + 5x7 print + 2 8x10 prints + Photo Book
(5 available)
 
 
*NOTE: I apologize ahead of time but I cannot ship internationally!
 

The Impact

Any contribution would mean the world to me. First, you're helping to raise awareness of Lupus as a disease. Two, you're helping me raise funds in order to be able to bring my project to light. Most importantly, you're showing me you've read the story about Brye.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that not everyone has the ability to physically donate. And that's okay. I only ask that you share this story with other people and get the word out. I would highly appreciate it!

story:
who I am:

Dave White, Owner of Studio DTW, a small photography studio based out of Pawtucket, RI.

After graduating from The New England School of Photography in Boston, MA, I spent several years honing my craft as an event and sports photographer. With each event, I found that my best shots were always the ones that captured the personal, private moments of the subjects - each frame telling a specific story that could bring them back to not only a place in time, but a place of mind. As I pushed myself, I strove to not only create pretty pictures but those that exposed the inner-life of the subjects, while at the same time, revealed a larger-than-life nature of the event. My career then evolved into creating advertising and lifestyle photography, shooting both in-studio and on location, for a wide variety of clientele.

I was ecstatic when I learned of a process to convert my photographs into translucent 3D-prints. I quickly realized the potential there-in, and after some extensive research, as well as much trial and error, Topografics were born.

what we're here for:

Our campaign will hopefully be a big help to get our 3D printing lab off the ground. With this, we can expand the small photography studio into something new and exciting to offer our clients. We are constantly thinking of new ways to combine the two worlds of photography and 3D printing and we can't wait to implement and develop more. These products are an example of what we can offer when we are able to afford a professional 3D printer. If our project is successful, we will be able to make this purchase.

We'd also like to continue the development of our product. The true beauty of Topografic™ prints is revealed when you view them in front of a light, whether it is in front of a window or an artificial source. With your funding, we are also going to be pursuing the development our patent pending idea of creating an artificial light source embedded into the frame. We believe that this will greatly enhance the range of enjoyment and flexibility of your topografic print.

This project is a fixed funding campaign. Since our first goal is to get a 3D printer, we need to cover those costs. Hopefully we can raise more than our goal to continue our development.

what we are offering:

Topografics™

Topografics™ are personalized 3D-printed photographs that have revolutionized the way we experience our favorite images. These are printed on high resolution 3D-printers from STL files, which have been converted from traditional photographs. Using specific preset parameters, Studio DTW is able to ensure that your print will look incredible. Adding the sense of touch, Topografics™ give you a fully immersive viewing experience. With these prints, not only are you viewing your favorite memories, but you can feel the texture, and see it come to life over and over.

The great thing about 3D-printing is its on-demand production. No need to make molds, assembly lines or any of that old-school business. We are diving head first into the exciting world of Rapid Prototyping and Additive Manufacturing. We already have a local company in place to help us develop all of these 100% unique and customized prints. This means that your digital photo gets sent to us, processed, printed, packed (all around Providence, RI) and shipped back to you. We are really hoping to nail down a local manufacturer for our frames as well, but we are still searching for the perfect fit.

Below is a visual breakdown of what we are offering:


what we're facing:

As this is our first time launching a campaign, we know it will be challenging to develop our final frames and coordinate production and shipping. Every Topografic print that we sell will come with an elegant, yet simple frame that can easily be displayed in a window, in front of a desk lamp or any light source you can conjure up. With your help, we will be able to develop our patent pending idea of creating an artificial light source embedded into the frame.

We are committed to providing very high quality 3D-prints. This means costs are going to be high, but still very manageable, and worth every penny. With new developments in technology and materials, and as 3D-printing becomes more and more prevalent, we believe we will be able to lower the price without sacrificing the quality.

story:
Short Summary

We thrive to help other, we believe that what good goes around, comes around.:

  • We, basically two friends from Melbourne Australia run a small social media marketing company and always find difficult to get good photos to use in our projects for a reasonable price. Most of the big stock images sites costs a lot and as we serve small businesses, we do not have a budget to purchase expensive photos. So, Gregory my friend clicks natural meaningful photographs catering small business needs and we give them away for free. We usually go out on Sundays to photograph and help others this way.
  • We came to indiegogo to ask for help, as we are small startup and do not have enough money to fund hosting, travel and management costs for this startup. We want to start slow and grow this community slowly. We have 10 photographers around the World on-board with 15,000 images ready to go live, but we need good servers and development cost to get this up and running.
  • Once the project is completed, all the supporters will get instant access to our library with special pack of 500 photos exclusive to supporters. We want to create a free online world with free beautiful meaningful images.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Right now, we have a small website(unlikestock.com) ready with our weekly newsletter sending 20-30 images weekly to our 20,000 subscribers.
  • We want to grow as fast as we can and send around 500k photos this year to all of subscribers, but that comes with the cost of web hosting, travel costs, email subscription costs and many equipment costs and that is why we are here!
  • If we do not reach the goal, we will still send our 5000+ photo library to everyone who supported us.

The Impact

  • Imagine access to beautiful curated 100k images, free to use anywhere. It would be great right ? We want to achieve that and we need your help.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot help us via money, you can always help us by sharing our website with your friends on social media, getting the word out in blogs, and whatever you think is the best way we can reach as many people as we can.

And that's all there is to it. Visit our website to subscribe today at www.unlikestock.com

story:
Please follow  on Twitter or Like on Facebook for details on a special opportunity after this campaign. 

The Mission...

   I am a photographer looking to create media for my new brand "NuRotic Media". I would like to produce calendars, posters and 8x10 photos of gorgeous glamour models. I am also collaborating with a national car club so there are sure to be classic and muscle cars as well. All models wil be 18+ and releases will be kept on file. I would like to produce these for events and conventions.

   I am also looking to collaborate with Fashion Designers and Special Effects Teams to advance this project further. Please contact if interested.

The Models...

   I plan to photograph gorgeous and exotic glamour models, not just the girl down the street. I have a beautiful new spokesmodel for "NuRotic Media". She has been published in Playboy, Hustler and many other magazines.

She can be seen here http://www.modelmayhem.com/1910984

the 2nd model has also been published in Hustler Magazine.

She can be seen here http://www.modelmayhem.com/2266066

 The third has been published on Romance Novel Covers!

 She can be seen here http://www.modelmayhem.com/899023

I will list more as the campaign moves forward.

The Funds...

   The funds raised will be applied to the cost of the shoots(compensation and travel) and the production of the media. I am expecting to do atleast 12 shoots to complete a calendar, 6 various posters and a minimum of 22 various 8x10s of which 10 will be made exclusively for contributors of this campaign.

The Perks...

   The perks are awesome of course! All backers who donate $1 or more will receive a Thank You email and their name will be posted on our website NuroticMedia.com (with consent). For every $1 donated, get a digital photo from our campaign.

    The media is available for pre-order and will be autographed! There are also some unique items and Limited Editions as well as opportunities such as viewing a shoot on webcam or attending a shoot LIVE!

   12 t-shirts will produced and worn by the models during the shoot and are available for a $100 donation. 

 

Updates...

   I will be putting any updates in this section. This will include any progress with the campaign or extended goals if the set amount is surpassed.

If there is something you are interested in as a Perk feel free to contact me and I can add to the menu.

Thank you in advance for your support!

   The perks are awesome of course! All backers who donate $1 or more will receive a Thank You email and their name will be posted on our website NuroticMedia.com (with consent). For every $1 donated, get a digital photo from our campaign.
    The media is available for pre-order and will be autographed! There are also some unique items and Limited Editions as well as opportunities such as viewing a shoot on webcam or attending a shoot LIVE!
   12 t-shirts will produced and worn by the models during the shoot and are available for a $100 donation. 

 
Updates...
   I will be putting any updates in this section. This will include any progress with the campaign or extended goals if the set amount is surpassed.
If there is something you are interested in as a Perk feel free to contact me and I can add to the menu.
Thank you in advance for your support!

story:
About K+A and Among Twins

Let us introduce our project and ourselves, We are K+A:

Kira – photographer-inventor, which reveals the inner world of people through photography and images. She is the K.

+

Artem - writer and journalist who writes about photo sessions, adventures and other activities of K+A. He trying to get to know people, and to convey their essence through conversations, surveys and articles. He is the A.

If you wish to learn more about us, we will be always glad to see you, at The universe of K+A: www.kirartem.com

We believe that every person is unique and beautiful in his own way. We believe in this, even when the person don’t believe. In each photo article, we try to convey a unique story of a person, his inner world, or his state of mind. 

We are always very carefully treat to each person, and we always co-ordinate every aspect of our work with that person. To each person we use an individual approach.

With somebody, we can spend many hours of conversation, but to someone conversation will seem superfluous, and only in front of the camera he can convey his true inner world, without further ado...

For several years of our work, we met many different people, including twins. And we became very interested, what is the essence lies behind persons, which looks very similar.



We worked with several twins, they told us about their life, about relations to each other, about how they see this world and much more. We photographed them, and always tried to convey their true essence, to convey which they really are. We met different pairs of twins, which were friendly on each other, and not exactly, worked with the twins, who tried to show that they are the one integrated entity, and with some twins, which more liked to show personality of each other. Also, we made personal interviews for the twins and conducted the survey with each twin, separately from each other, for explore the point of view, of each twin, and then compared their results. For each pair of twins, we came up with unique, appropriate to them, questions based on their relationships, temperament, lifestyle... As a result, we created amazing photo articles with the twins.



Before we start working with the twins, we couldn’t have imagined how interesting and amazing this experience. We would like to share this experience with the world! That is why we decided to create our project “Among Twins”!!!

In “Among Twins.Europe”, we will try to visit as much as possible countries of Europe, to meet there as much as possible twins, and at last to know the answer to a question of the whole world: “Who are the twins?” It is our first project “Among Twins”, and as it is clear of the word Europe, we are going to visit in our first project some countries in Europe, and with the twins from the each country we will create amazing a photo article.

From you, dear friend, will depend, number of the countries which we will visit in Europe, and respectively, and number of twins. (How exactly you can help us, you can learn below, in the section "Help us"). The end result, will be the awesome Photobook "Among Twins.Europe", which we ,with pleasure will, share with you, after you purchase one of our perk. 

Yes, it is our first big project, and yes it will pass in Europe, but it doesn't mean that, having finished this project we will stop on it, in independence of success of this project, we want to visit as much as possible countries of the world, and to depict as much as possible twins in our photo articles. Therefore, we need your help. Let's create this project together! You are the irreplaceable member of our team. Yes, TEAM, everyone who will help us by anything, that already part of our team. We are always glad to listen to your wishes and thoughts. After all, only together with you, we will be able to show what it's like to be Among Twins.



Plans and Costs

Our plans are very great. The most priority task for us is to share with you and with the whole world, our works.  Therefore, our way is difficult.  Almost half of our expenses will account to the manufacture of our products for you and all other contributors. And since almost half of this amount will be spent on gifts for you, we will remain the sum which, according to our calculations, will last only for three countries that we can visit in Europe, this countries is: Poland, Germany and Czech Republic. But, as we already wrote, all in your hands. We create this project together, and we very much hope for your support. From number of the gained sum, will depend the number of the countries and number of twins. Each gathered $10000, over ours goal, will add on 2-3 countries, in our list of a trip, and at least on 2-3 pairs of twins. We thought of adding electronic versions of our photobooks to our productions, in this way we could reduce our expenses, but we refused at once this idea. Expenses. We are ready on any expenses, only in order that each contributor could hold before himself our photobook and could behold essence of twins, to see that we saw, to feel that energy, those feelings which we felt, being Among Twins.



We very much want to capture the twins as much as possible and to do that we need to visit as many countries as possible in Europe. We have very big plans for the project "Among Twins". No matter, successful, or very successful, or opposite effect, will the end this project, we promise immediately to start a new project. Where we will go? Maybe we will go to look for twins on States? Or we will look in Asia? Everything depends on you, dear friends. 

So, our expenses. Here you will see where will go your hard-earned money.



43% - As we wrote above, most of the costs are for the production of your gifts.

23% - We will have to, somehow get to Europe and back, here are mentioned the costs of airfares, ground transportation, insurance and visa fees.

18% - This is a natural needs, food, accommodation and of course unexpected expenses

10% - Will go to Indiegogo fee and Bank charges.

6% - We will have to supplemented our photo gear

Also, it may happen that somewhere we will save a bit more money than planned, then the total saved money, will go on to our visit an additional country or on additional gifts to you.


About Perks

Always with you- 25$


  Fan of citations - 55$


                                          Feel «Among twins» - 150$

                                              

                  

                                               Among twins  - 500$


                                  Your unique NOMINAL set* - 1500$


* NOMINAL set includes a personal appeal to You, in each photobook from one set. 

Grateful leaf of «Among twins» team - gratitude to all members of team who help us in creation and realization of our project, on all social nets, on credits of video and on other places where we will be able to thank you!



No one will lose!

No one will lose!

This section is devoted to risks. This section will be short, because, in independence from the number at the total funds, you will always receive the awards for your contribution. However, if the project doesn't score the necessary sum for the trip to Europe, we have already photo articles with twins, with whom we worked earlier. And you receive everything that we promised you in perks, only with images and photo articles of twins with which we worked earlier. But, we believe in the best and we hope that we will score the necessary goal for a trip to Europe and we will be able to please you with new adventures of Among twins.




All kinds of help

If you can't make the contribution, it doesn't mean, you can't help.

The most important after the contributions is information, please, share our project with the family, friends and acquaintances that as much as possible people learned about our project! We will thank you as well as contributors, in a 'Grateful leaf of our team', after all, each who help us, in our team.

Help to us to find twins or help to twins to find us. Or you are twin? Or you have friends twins? You want to be a part of “Among Twins”?  Cool. No matter from where you are, from what country and city. Send your summary in which specify small information about you and your brother/sister, yours location, and some photos, to our mail: amongtwins@kirartem.com. Don’t forget to write a theme ’We are twins’. And perhaps you will become the following participant of the project "Among Twins".

Also, dear friend, in our photo articles we described our surveys, which we conduct to the twins, the questions in these surveys we invent ourselves, To feel yourself closer to the project, you can suggest a question,which you would like that we will ask the twins. In order that we asked your question to twins, you should follow these steps: 1) go on our website: www.kirartem.com . 2) In menu find "Among Twins" , and hover over this tab. 3) Find 'Question for Twins' and click on it. 4) click on 'Click here to write your question' . 5) enter your name,email and question, and click on black button below. That's all. We, with impatience, wait for your questions. 

We are always open for collaboration with makeup artists, decorators, stylists, designers, and all creative and interested people. To contact us you can write us a message, with theme ’Collaboration’ on: amongtwins@kirartem.com

You from the press? It's cool! We love the press. Also we will be grateful if you write about us. We are always glad to answer questions, which you can set to the address: general@kirartem.com

If you notice any mistakes or inconsistencies, we will be very grateful if you let us know about them. Thank you!!!

We think that everybody want to know, what it's like to be Among Twins.

story:
Who we are? // Kdo jsme?

We are a group of friends who like to travel and meet new people. We love travelling and we would like to share our passion and joy with people we meet on the road. We are starting our journey at the beginning of this campaign during which we plan to give way photos taken by Fuji Instax cameras and remind people of the feeling of holding the photos in their hands.

Digital cameras might promise to store all our photos effortlessly. However, photos are taken, saved and forgotten somewhere among many other files on our computers. We would like to get back to basics - one shot, one original photo and a lot of happiness.

We have given out more than 100 photos and saw what joy can one photo bring. And the best thing about it? It costs less than one beer to make someone happy. 


What do we need and what will you get in return? 

We have the cameras, some money for travelling and also some film cassettes. We don’t need much and we’ve learnt to travel for a bare minimum. Nevertheless, we need a lot more film cassettes in order to give away as many photos as possible. After deducting the costs of films we will be left with 2000 euros for 4 people for 2 months (250 euro per person per month).  

If you bought us a “beer”, it would cover our expenses of giving away photo to one person and a little patch for travelling around Europe. If we manage to raise 3000€, we will visit the capital cities of EU (except for Cyprus and Malta) including Switzerland and Norway. Not to mention many other cities that we visit on our road. We will give away photos of people and places while traveling or send them to the address you provide us. This way, we can make your friend or just a random person happy.

We will post our photos, observations and traveling updates online at whowantsaphotonow.com and on our facebook. We will also inform you about our actual whereabouts and where we are heading to, so we can meet with you.

We would like to meet every single one of you and if it is possible, take a photo of your desire. We would like to meet you for a coffee or grab a beer with you and talk about our traveling and shooting experience. We will love to give you tips for good places to visit and tricks on how to travel low cost.


Targets

Reaching each target, will prolong our travels by half a year.

3000€ - Photo shooting in the EU+Switzerland+Norway. 2-4 months. We will start taking photos 2 weeks after achieving 3000 EUR goal. We will take pictures mostly in capital cities and other cities on our planned route. We will give away the photos mainly to your friends, fellow travellers who we meet and also to the fans at music festivals.

10000€ - Photo shooting will take place in the whole Europe. We will give away photos mainly to children and families in less developed regions. (We can also visit some nursing facilities or any other non-profit organizations).

20000€ - We will add 10 more countries in North Africa and East Asia.

30000€ - We will add 10 more countries in Southeast Asia.

40000€ - We will add 10 states in North and Central America.

50000€ - We will add 10 more countries in South America.

100000€ - We can take photos and give them away in more than 90% of the countries in the world.


Risks & Challenges

We travelled around Europe many times and we always did pretty well (nobody got harmed in any way, nor robbed). We can’t influence natural disasters and don’t want to predict small wounds but there’s gonna be more of us in the terrain so the risks will be spread. Instax photos are a good quality and trustworthy product.

The second risk is related to the vendor of negatives. We could face distributing issues and troubles with supply. We will try to have a stockpile of negatives at hand and we will deal with other prospective problems operatively.


We are starting right now

You can find us in June and July at these places:

Hove Festival, Oslo, Bergen, Trondheim, Bodø, Tromsø, Stockholm, Malmö, Roskilde Festival, Pohoda Festival, Reggae Geel Festival, Copenhagen, and Amsterdam.

After we reach our goal, we will be able to start shooting around these locations:

Sweden, Denmark, Netherlands, United Kingdom, Germany, Thailand, specifically Lowlands Festival, Rotterdam, Helsinki, Brussels, Luxembourg City, Paris, London, Dublin, Hamburg, Munich, Berlin, and Bangkok.

When the campaign is finished, we will be travelling in the following countries:

Spain, Portugal, Italy, Austria, Switzerland, Slovenia, Croatia, Bulgaria, Romania, Greece, Hungary, Slovakia, Czech Republic, Poland, Lithuania, Latvia, and Estonia.

And many more! It all depends on your generous support.


If you want to support our project in a different way than by money, you can share our tumblr whowantsaphotonow.com and our facebook. Let people know about us!


CZECH VERSION

Příspěvky 

2€ - Poděkování na webu. Můžeš nám zaslat tvoji oskenovanou analogovou fotku a my ji zveřejníme na našem webu. 

3€ - Daruj radost! (anonymně) Za tvůj příspěvek obdarujeme fotkou náhodného člověka, kterému podle nás snímek udělá radost. 

4€ - Daruj radost! Za tvůj příspěvek obdarujeme fotkou náhodného člověka, kterému podle nás snímek udělá radost. K fotce přiložíme tvé jméno a email. 

5€ - Vyfotíme tě! Pokud si nás najdeš na naší trase, uděláme ti originální fotku. V případě, že se nepotkáme, uděláme fotkou radost někomu jinému. 

8€ // 5000x - Udělej radost originálním dopisem! Urči místo, které na naší trase máme vyfotit (dům, ulici, bar, řeku, jezero, horu…) a my snímek pošleme na tebou určenou adresu s textem, který nám dodáš. 

10€ // 5000x - Udělej radost originálním dopisem! Pokud si nás najdeš na naší trase, uděláme ti originální fotku a odešleme ji na adresu, kterou nám dáš. V případě, že se nepotkáme, věnujeme 2 fotky náhodným lidem. 

20€ // 3000x - Čtyři fotky s tebou pro tebe! Domluvíme si s tebou schůzku na naší trase a uděláme ti 4 fotky. 

50€ // 500x - Udělej radost těm, kteří to potřebují nejvíc! Za tvůj příspěvek navšítíme vybrané sociální zařízení (domov pro seniory, domov dětí) a darujeme fotky jeho uživatelům. V zařízení necháme tvůj kontakt (jméno, email). 

60€ // 1000x - Udělej radost 20 lidem! (anonymně) Za tvůj příspěvek obdarujeme fotkou 20 různých lidí. 

100€ // 300x - Nafotíme tvoji akci! Přijedeme na tvoji akci, bude-li do 100 km od naší plánované trasy, a uděláme ti 20+ fotek. Domluva je nutná alespoň týden před konanou akcí. 

888€ // 111x - Udělej radost 222 lidem! Za tvůj příspěvek obdarujeme fotkou 222 lidí. Na každou fotku od tebe nalepíme nálepku s tvým logem, jménem, emailem. Uvedeme tě na webu jako velkého dárce. 

8888€ // 11x - Udělej radost 2222 lidem! Za tento příspěvek přijedeme na místo v předem domluveném termínu, které vybereš a rozdáme zde 2222 fotek. Na každou fotku nalepíme tvou nálepku. Na webu tě uvedeme jako hlavního dárce.
Přesun v rámci EU v cene. Mimo EU - platíš náklady na zpáteční cestu.


Kdo jsme?

Jsme skupina kamarádů, která ráda cestuje a poznává nové lidi. Cestování nám dělá radost a my bychom ji rádi šířili dál mezi lidi, které během našich putování potkáváme. Společně se spuštěním této kampaně vyrážíme na cesty, během nichž budeme lidem rozdávat polaroidové fotky a navracet jim radost z možnosti držet ve svých rukách analogovou fotku. 

Digitální fotoaparáty nám slibují, že uchovají všechny naše fotky bez námahy. Zachycené, uložené, zapomenuté kdesi v útrobách našich počítačů. My se vracíme zpět k základům - jedno cvaknutí, jeden originál, spousta radosti. 

Zatím jsme rozdali víc než 100 fotek a víme, jaké nadšení může jeden snímek vyvolat. Pomozte nám potěšit co nejvíce lidí. Udělat někomu radost vás může stát míň než jedno pivo. 


Co potřebujeme a co dostanete nazpět? 

Máme fotoaparáty, peníze na cestování a kazety na focení. Nejsme nároční, cestovat umíme za úplné minimum a hlavní věc, kterou potřebujeme, jsou negativy, abychom mohli obdarovat co nejvíc lidí. Po odpočítání nákladů na negativy nám zůstává 2000€ pro 4 lidi na 2 měsíce (250€ pro jednoho na měsíc). 

Kdybyste nám virtuálně koupili pivo, pokryje nám to náklady na obdarování jednoho člověka a malý příspěvek na cestu po Evropě. Když se nám podaří vybrat 3000€, objedeme hlavní města států EU (kromě Kypru a Malty) včetně Švýcarska a Norska. Nemluvě o dalších místech a městech, která budeme mít po cestě. 

Fotky lidí a míst buď darujeme na cestách, nebo zašleme na adresu, kterou nám napíšete. Můžete tak udělat radost úplně cizímu člověku, ale i někomu z vašich blízkých. Postřehy a fotografie z cest budeme zveřejňovat na našem webu whowantsaphotonow.com. Tam a také na facebooku budeme zvěřejňovat, kde se zrovna nacházíme a kam plánujeme jet, abychom se s vámi mohli potkat. 

Chceme vyjít každému vstříc a pokud to bude možné vyfotit to, co budete chtít. Rádi za vámi po cestě zajdeme na kávu či pivo. Podělíme se o historky z focení i zcest. Předáme tipy na místá, které stojí za vidění a triky na snížení cestovních nákladů. 

Výše nalezete místa na kterých se budeme nacházet.


Cíle

Dosáhnutím každého cíle, prodložíme naše cestování o půl roku. 

3000€ - Focení v EU + Švýcarsko, Norsko. 2-4 měsíce. Začneme fotit 2 týdny po vysbíraní 3000 eur. Focení v hlavních městech + jiných městách po trase. Fotky darujeme především vaším kamarádům, ostatním cestovatelům na které narazíme a fanouškům na hudebních festivalech. 

10000€ - Focení v celé Evropě na půl roku. Darované fotky budou cílene především na děti a rodiny v chudších regionech (Můžeme navštívit i dětské domovy, domovy důchodců, léčebny pro mentálně zaostalé), 

20000€ - Přídáme 10 zemí v Severní Africe a Vychodní Asii 

30000€ - Přídáme 10 zemí v Jihovýchodní Asii 

40000€ - Přídáme 10 zemí v Severní a Strední Americe. 

50000€ - Přídáme 10 zemí v Jižní Americe 

100000€ - Můžeme odfotit a obdarovat lidi ve více než 90% států světa. 


Risk a výzvy

Už několikrát jsme křížem krážem procestovali Evropu a myslíme si, že to máme zmáknuté (zatím jsme se nikde nezranili ani nás nikdo neokradl). Živelným pohromám a úrazům se možná nevyhneme, ale fotit nás bude víc, proto se riziko rozloží. Instaxové fotky jsou kvalitní a spolehlivé. 

Druhým rizikem je už jen prodejce negativů. Můžeme mít problémy s distributorem a skladováním zásob. Budeme se snažít mít vždy dostatečnou zásobu negativů a případné problémy budeme operativně řešit. 


Chcete-li podpořit náš projekt jinak než finančně, sdílejte náš tumblr whowantsaphotonow.com, náš  facebook a dejte lidem o nás vědět.
story_txt:
Who we are? // Kdo jsme?We are a group of friends who like to travel and meet new people. We love travelling and we would like to share our passion and joy with people we meet on the road. We are starting our journey at the beginning of this campaign during which we plan to give way photos taken by Fuji Instax cameras and remind people of the feeling of holding the photos in their hands.Digital cameras might promise to store all our photos effortlessly. However, photos are taken, saved and forgotten somewhere among many other files on our computers. We would like to get back to basics - one shot, one original photo and a lot of happiness.We have given out more than 100 photos and saw what joy can one photo bring. And the best thing about it? It costs less than one beer to make someone happy. What do we need and what will you get in return? We have the cameras, some money for travelling and also some film cassettes. We don’t need much and we’ve learnt to travel for a bare minimum. Nevertheless, we need a lot more film cassettes in order to give away as many photos as possible. After deducting the costs of films we will be left with 2000 euros for 4 people for 2 months (250 euro per person per month).  If you bought us a “beer”, it would cover our expenses of giving away photo to one person and a little patch for travelling around Europe. If we manage to raise 3000€, we will visit the capital cities of EU (except for Cyprus and Malta) including Switzerland and Norway. Not to mention many other cities that we visit on our road. We will give away photos of people and places while traveling or send them to the address you provide us. This way, we can make your friend or just a random person happy.We will post our photos, observations and traveling updates online at whowantsaphotonow.com and on our facebook. We will also inform you about our actual whereabouts and where we are heading to, so we can meet with you. We would like to meet every single one of you and if it is possible, take a photo of your desire. We would like to meet you for a coffee or grab a beer with you and talk about our traveling and shooting experience. We will love to give you tips for good places to visit and tricks on how to travel low cost. TargetsReaching each target, will prolong our travels by half a year.3000€ - Photo shooting in the EU+Switzerland+Norway. 2-4 months. We will start taking photos 2 weeks after achieving 3000 EUR goal. We will take pictures mostly in capital cities and other cities on our planned route. We will give away the photos mainly to your friends, fellow travellers who we meet and also to the fans at music festivals.10000€ - Photo shooting will take place in the whole Europe. We will give away photos mainly to children and families in less developed regions. (We can also visit some nursing facilities or any other non-profit organizations).20000€ - We will add 10 more countries in North Africa and East Asia.30000€ - We will add 10 more countries in Southeast Asia.40000€ - We will add 10 states in North and Central America.50000€ - We will add 10 more countries in South America.100000€ - We can take photos and give them away in more than 90% of the countries in the world.Risks & ChallengesWe travelled around Europe many times and we always did pretty well (nobody got harmed in any way, nor robbed). We can’t influence natural disasters and don’t want to predict small wounds but there’s gonna be more of us in the terrain so the risks will be spread. Instax photos are a good quality and trustworthy product.The second risk is related to the vendor of negatives. We could face distributing issues and troubles with supply. We will try to have a stockpile of negatives at hand and we will deal with other prospective problems operatively.We are starting right nowYou can find us in June and July at these places:Hove Festival, Oslo, Bergen, Trondheim, Bodø, Tromsø, Stockholm, Malmö, Roskilde Festival, Pohoda Festival, Reggae Geel Festival, Copenhagen, and Amsterdam.After we reach our goal, we will be able to start shooting around these locations:Sweden, Denmark, Netherlands, United Kingdom, Germany, Thailand, specifically Lowlands Festival, Rotterdam, Helsinki, Brussels, Luxembourg City, Paris, London, Dublin, Hamburg, Munich, Berlin, and Bangkok.When the campaign is finished, we will be travelling in the following countries:Spain, Portugal, Italy, Austria, Switzerland, Slovenia, Croatia, Bulgaria, Romania, Greece, Hungary, Slovakia, Czech Republic, Poland, Lithuania, Latvia, and Estonia.And many more! It all depends on your generous support.If you want to support our project in a different way than by money, you can share our tumblr whowantsaphotonow.com and our facebook. Let people know about us!CZECH VERSIONPříspěvky 2€ - Poděkování na webu. Můžeš nám zaslat tvoji oskenovanou analogovou fotku a my ji zveřejníme na našem webu. 3€ - Daruj radost! (anonymně) Za tvůj příspěvek obdarujeme fotkou náhodného člověka, kterému podle nás snímek udělá radost. 4€ - Daruj radost! Za tvůj příspěvek obdarujeme fotkou náhodného člověka, kterému podle nás snímek udělá radost. K fotce přiložíme tvé jméno a email. 5€ - Vyfotíme tě! Pokud si nás najdeš na naší trase, uděláme ti originální fotku. V případě, že se nepotkáme, uděláme fotkou radost někomu jinému. 8€ // 5000x - Udělej radost originálním dopisem! Urči místo, které na naší trase máme vyfotit (dům, ulici, bar, řeku, jezero, horu…) a my snímek pošleme na tebou určenou adresu s textem, který nám dodáš. 10€ // 5000x - Udělej radost originálním dopisem! Pokud si nás najdeš na naší trase, uděláme ti originální fotku a odešleme ji na adresu, kterou nám dáš. V případě, že se nepotkáme, věnujeme 2 fotky náhodným lidem. 20€ // 3000x - Čtyři fotky s tebou pro tebe! Domluvíme si s tebou schůzku na naší trase a uděláme ti 4 fotky. 50€ // 500x - Udělej radost těm, kteří to potřebují nejvíc! Za tvůj příspěvek navšítíme vybrané sociální zařízení (domov pro seniory, domov dětí) a darujeme fotky jeho uživatelům. V zařízení necháme tvůj kontakt (jméno, email). 60€ // 1000x - Udělej radost 20 lidem! (anonymně) Za tvůj příspěvek obdarujeme fotkou 20 různých lidí. 100€ // 300x - Nafotíme tvoji akci! Přijedeme na tvoji akci, bude-li do 100 km od naší plánované trasy, a uděláme ti 20+ fotek. Domluva je nutná alespoň týden před konanou akcí. 888€ // 111x - Udělej radost 222 lidem! Za tvůj příspěvek obdarujeme fotkou 222 lidí. Na každou fotku od tebe nalepíme nálepku s tvým logem, jménem, emailem. Uvedeme tě na webu jako velkého dárce. 8888€ // 11x - Udělej radost 2222 lidem! Za tento příspěvek přijedeme na místo v předem domluveném termínu, které vybereš a rozdáme zde 2222 fotek. Na každou fotku nalepíme tvou nálepku. Na webu tě uvedeme jako hlavního dárce. Přesun v rámci EU v cene. Mimo EU - platíš náklady na zpáteční cestu.
Kdo jsme?Jsme skupina kamarádů, která ráda cestuje a poznává nové lidi. Cestování nám dělá radost a my bychom ji rádi šířili dál mezi lidi, které během našich putování potkáváme. Společně se spuštěním této kampaně vyrážíme na cesty, během nichž budeme lidem rozdávat polaroidové fotky a navracet jim radost z možnosti držet ve svých rukách analogovou fotku. Digitální fotoaparáty nám slibují, že uchovají všechny naše fotky bez námahy. Zachycené, uložené, zapomenuté kdesi v útrobách našich počítačů. My se vracíme zpět k základům - jedno cvaknutí, jeden originál, spousta radosti. Zatím jsme rozdali víc než 100 fotek a víme, jaké nadšení může jeden snímek vyvolat. Pomozte nám potěšit co nejvíce lidí. Udělat někomu radost vás může stát míň než jedno pivo. Co potřebujeme a co dostanete nazpět? Máme fotoaparáty, peníze na cestování a kazety na focení. Nejsme nároční, cestovat umíme za úplné minimum a hlavní věc, kterou potřebujeme, jsou negativy, abychom mohli obdarovat co nejvíc lidí. Po odpočítání nákladů na negativy nám zůstává 2000€ pro 4 lidi na 2 měsíce (250€ pro jednoho na měsíc). Kdybyste nám virtuálně koupili pivo, pokryje nám to náklady na obdarování jednoho člověka a malý příspěvek na cestu po Evropě. Rádi za vámi po cestě zajdeme na kávu či pivo. Podělíme se o historky z focení i zcest. Předáme tipy na místá, které stojí za vidění a triky na snížení cestovních nákladů. Výše nalezete místa na kterých se budeme nacházet.CíleDosáhnutím každého cíle, prodložíme naše cestování o půl roku. 3000€ - Focení v EU + Švýcarsko, Norsko. 2-4 měsíce. Začneme fotit 2 týdny po vysbíraní 3000 eur. Focení v hlavních městech + jiných městách po trase. Fotky darujeme především vaším kamarádům, ostatním cestovatelům na které narazíme a fanouškům na hudebních festivalech. 10000€ - Focení v celé Evropě na půl roku. Darované fotky budou cílene především na děti a rodiny v chudších regionech (Můžeme navštívit i dětské domovy, domovy důchodců, léčebny pro mentálně zaostalé), 20000€ - Přídáme 10 zemí v Severní Africe a Vychodní Asii 30000€ - Přídáme 10 zemí v Jihovýchodní Asii 40000€ - Přídáme 10 zemí v Severní a Strední Americe. 50000€ - Přídáme 10 zemí v Jižní Americe 100000€ - Můžeme odfotit a obdarovat lidi ve více než 90% států světa. Risk a výzvyUž několikrát jsme křížem krážem procestovali Evropu a myslíme si, že to máme zmáknuté (zatím jsme se nikde nezranili ani nás nikdo neokradl). Můžeme mít problémy s distributorem a skladováním zásob. Budeme se snažít mít vždy dostatečnou zásobu negativů a případné problémy budeme operativně řešit. Chcete-li podpořit náš projekt jinak než finančně, sdílejte náš tumblr whowantsaphotonow.com, náš  facebook a dejte lidem o nás vědět.

story:
Mein Name ist Manuela Jäger-Müller und ich bin Fotografin. Meine Leidenschaft ist es, Menschen zu zeigen, die nicht dem Schönheitsideal entsprechen, aber genauso schön sind. Zu klein, zu dick, zu dünn, mit Narben oder zu bunt; es gibt nichts was es nicht gibt.

Aufgrund einer Bilderaktion mit Dr. Mark Benecke, Kriminalbiologe und bekannt durch viele TV-Sendungen, wurden die Nachfragen nach einem Kalender mit Tattoomodels die keine Modelmaße haben oder Makel wie Narben ect., so enorm, dass mein Kopfkino in Gang kam und ja, wir sollten uns jedes Jahr und 365 Tage im Jahr daran erinnern, das jeder von uns schön sein kann.

Ihr könnt es ermöglichen, dass wir einen Kalender erstellen, in dem tätowierte Menschen  zu sehen sein werden, die aussehen wie du und ich, egal, welche Kleidergröße sie tragen, egal, wie lang ihre Beine sind und egal, was sie sonst noch besonders macht. Alter spielt keine Rolle, Religion spielt keine Rolle und auch sonst gibt es keine Formen, denn der Kalender soll uns zeigen als das, was wir sind, nämlich Menschen.

Wenn wir das Finanzierungsziel erreichen, werden Dr. Mark Benecke und ich einen Tag in einem Kölner Fotostudio Shootings mit Euch machen (Termin und Ort werden nach Erreichen des Finanzierungsziels noch bekannt gegeben)

Jeder kann sich bewerben und wir schauen, das wir einen bunten Mix von allen für den Kalender aussuchen, um eben unsere Gesellschaft widerzuspiegeln.

Die ausgesuchten Personen werden dann von mir fotografiert, erhalten drei Bilder aus dem Shooting als Datei für sich, und eins dieser Fotos wird für den Kalender verwendet.

Mit eurer Unterstützung sind die Kosten zur Erstellung des Kalenders komplett abgedeckt. Das Studio, das Layout, der Druck des Kalenders mit allem Drum und Dran. Dr. Mark Benecke möchte für diesen Tag kein Geld und freut sich einfach, das Projekt mit seiner Person unterstützen zu können.

Mit eurer Unterstützung könnt ihr euch z.B. schon einen Kalender sichern oder eine Person eurer Wahl wird auf jeden Fall mit im Kalender abgedruckt.

Niemand sollte sich verstecken müssen und niemand sollte sich schämen müssen. Die Gesellschaft ist kunterbunt und so sollten wir uns auch zeigen dürfen.

Selbst große Tattoo-Zeitungen weigern sich, Mädels ab Kleidergröße 40 zu zeigen. Laßt uns trotzdem zeigen, wie schön wir alle sind.

Wir müssen uns gemeinsam stärken, um zu sehen, wie schön wir sind.

Nicht jeder hat die finanziellen Möglichkeiten, das Projekt zu unterstützen, aber jeder kann helfen, in dem ihr euern Freunden davon erzählt, das Projekt teilt und z.B auf Facebook Werbung dafür macht.

story:
HI!

Hi, I’m Julian Latif, an LA based photographer from Jakarta, Indonesia. I came to Los Angeles in 2010 to go to college. I have been interested in photography since I was a kid and it had become more and more apparent as I grew up. So, I decided to pursue a degree in that field. Studying photography at Art Center College of Design in Pasadena has been an eye-opening experience for me. It revealed so many things that have deepened my affection for photography, film camera in particular. That is why I mainly shoot with film, because I just love the genuine and raw details that no digital cameras could ever catch. As I just graduated a few of months ago, I planned on going back home to Indonesia and continue my career path there. So here am I, spending my last year here in LA doing things that I thought would prepare me for the real world, including this project that I am about to explain further below.

                                          Jon Cozart, Brizzy Voices and Luke Korns

BTW If you get the early bird price, the book will be delivered to your door early June, which means you can bring it to VIDCON (June 23rd) to ask for signatures from each of the YouTuber on their portraits!

                                                          Gaby Dunn & Allison Raskin

WHY?

I’ve always been fascinated by YouTubers who consistently make videos not only as their jobs, but also as an expression of their passion, which then could make such a big influence to wide range of people across and beyond the nation. Since I’m a photographer, I was inspired to make a photobook to appreciate what they do through music, gaming, daily vlogs, spoofs, beauty, etc. Although it started with a lot of doubts of whether or not I would be able to make it, I’m thankful for the help of so many people, pictured or not pictured, that I am able to reach to this point.


RED PLAY BOOK

                                                                Lucas Cruikshank

“Red Play Book” is dedicated to all the people who are involved in it and all their fans; not to mention those who just have interest and passion in arts and photography like I do. I love to shoot real people, not just models. Like these YouTubers, there are no masks, filters, that keep me from finding their emotion. So, this book is not merely just a collection of portraits, but there is also a portrayal of genuine personality of each YouTuber. I’m so glad that through this project, I was privileged to meet many different unique souls and to call them my friends.


I hope you will enjoy this book, and this will indeed mark a good end of my journey in the United States before I go back home to Indonesia for good later this year.


P.S. All of the pictures were taken with medium and large format film camera.


       Also, follow me on my Instragram, twitter or                  

         snapchat @JULTODAWG to keep updated.


Risks & Challenges

The goal of this Indiegogo campaign is to raise the fund needed for printing the Red Play photo book. Most of the subjects for the book has already been photographed, there are some other YouTubers that are still in the scheduling process. Multiple rewards and funding and reward framework have been calculated to ensure that all the perks and rewards fall within the budget and means to fulfill in a timely manner.


One of the hardest things for me is choosing the 'one' best image to use of each YouTuber. It's a task that only I can do and it's very time-consuming. I have a very good relationship with each YouTuber that i shot for this book. I'm established to make each of them proud, and also to show the viewer how they really are in real life and not repeating on each image. Emotion and quality is the main core foundation for me and even for this book.


I shot a fair amount of YouTuber but only the most dynamic images will make the cut for the book. But I think this will establish that the book will be full of pretty hardcore dynamic and hopefully to you guys amazing images of these amazing Youtuber.


Once the amount has been fulfilled and the campaign ended, a proof book will be printed. Any error will be corrected and the book will be sent to the printer. During that time I'm going to do all the darkroom prints and collecting all the polaroid for the rest of the rewards. Upon completion, the book will be randomly sampled to ensure quality. Then, the orders will be fulfilled and shipped.


Due to the fact that this project is complete (with the exception of having been printed), the risks and challenges are minimal. The greatest risk identified is a potential misprint which could push back the timeline. Should a misprint occur after the book has been proofed, the print company has confirmed their commitment to quality and will reprint as necessary.

YOU CAN HELP TOO! 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Simply by just spreading the word to your friends, or share using #redplaybook in your social media accounts.
  • Indiegogo have a share tool for you guys to share this campaign with a single click, how easy is that?!

It revealed so many things that have deepened my affection for photography, film camera in particular. That is why I mainly shoot with film, because I just love the genuine and raw details that no digital cameras could ever catch. As I just graduated a few of months ago, I planned on going back home to Indonesia and continue my career path there. So here am I, spending my last year here in LA doing things that I thought would prepare me for the real world, including this project that I am about to explain further below.                                           Jon Cozart, Brizzy Voices and Luke Korns  BTW If you get the early bird price, the book will be delivered to your door early June, which means you can bring it to VIDCON (June 23rd) to ask for signatures from each of the YouTuber on their portraits!


                                                          Gaby Dunn & Allison Raskin
    WHY? 
I’ve always been fascinated by YouTubers who consistently make videos not only as their jobs, but also as an expression of their passion, which then could make such a big influence to wide range of people across and beyond the nation. Since I’m a photographer, I was inspired to make a photobook to appreciate what they do through music, gaming, daily vlogs, spoofs, beauty, etc. Although it started with a lot of doubts of whether or not I would be able to make it, I’m thankful for the help of so many people, pictured or not pictured, that I am able to reach to this point.

RED PLAY BOOK



                                                                Lucas Cruikshank

“Red Play Book” is dedicated to all the people who are involved in it and all their fans; not to mention those who just have interest and passion in arts and photography like I do. I love to shoot real people, not just models. Like these YouTubers, there are no masks, filters, that keep me from finding their emotion. So, this book is not merely just a collection of portraits, but there is also a portrayal of genuine personality of each YouTuber. I’m so glad that through this project, I was privileged to meet many different unique souls and to call them my friends.
I hope you will enjoy this book, and this will indeed mark a good end of my journey in the United States before I go back home to Indonesia for good later this year.
P.S. All of the pictures were taken with medium and large format film camera.

       Also, follow me on my Instragram, twitter or                   
         snapchat @JULTODAWG to keep updated.

  Risks & Challenges  

The goal of this Indiegogo campaign is to raise the fund needed for printing the Red Play photo book. Most of the subjects for the book has already been photographed, there are some other YouTubers that are still in the scheduling process. Multiple rewards and funding and reward framework have been calculated to ensure that all the perks and rewards fall within the budget and means to fulfill in a timely manner.
One of the hardest things for me is choosing the 'one' best image to use of each YouTuber. It's a task that only I can do and it's very time-consuming. I have a very good relationship with each YouTuber that i shot for this book. I'm established to make each of them proud, and also to show the viewer how they really are in real life and not repeating on each image. Emotion and quality is the main core foundation for me and even for this book. 
I shot a fair amount of YouTuber but only the most dynamic images will make the cut for the book. But I think this will establish that the book will be full of pretty hardcore dynamic and hopefully to you guys amazing images of these amazing Youtuber.
Once the amount has been fulfilled and the campaign ended, a proof book will be printed. Any error will be corrected and the book will be sent to the printer. During that time I'm going to do all the darkroom prints and collecting all the polaroid for the rest of the rewards. Upon completion, the book will be randomly sampled to ensure quality. Then, the orders will be fulfilled and shipped.
Due to the fact that this project is complete (with the exception of having been printed), the risks and challenges are minimal. The greatest risk identified is a potential misprint which could push back the timeline. Should a misprint occur after the book has been proofed, the print company has confirmed their commitment to quality and will reprint as necessary.   YOU CAN HELP TOO!  Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  Simply by just spreading the word to your friends, or share using #redplaybook in your social media accounts. Indiegogo have a share tool for you guys to share this campaign with a single click, how easy is that?!

story:
THE PROJECT

Dhanbad is called the "Capital of Coal" and is located in Jharkhand state in northern India. Coal is mined everywhere, and large parts are sorted by hand by people who once had land and houses, and lived in villages that now have become big black pits. Many have been forced away from these areas when companies and authorities recognized the richness that hides in the ground. The underground fires force people to relocate. The mining companies claim they are unable to put out the fires while the local people blame the companies for letting the fires burn so the coal can be reached and excavated from underneath the villages.

BLACK DIAMOND is about the environmental aspects of fossil fuel usage and it is also a close portrait of the people who work with extracting it from the ground. The photographs show the coal mining and the everyday lives of coal workers and miners in India.

There is a fragile balance between nature and mankind. The human inability to break patterns is painstakingly visible in these photographs, as we knowingly keep on extracting the ground beneath our own feet. Energy produced by the burning of coal is the single biggest contributor to the carbon dioxide emissions generated by human kind. Coal is a major part in the issue of global warming.

THE BOOK

BLACK DIAMOND will be a high quality hardcover photo book with printed cover and 112 pages containing 42 photographs including 5 double fold-out pages (left and right). The book will go to print in October/November 2018. It will be published and designed by German Kehrer Verlag.

Book Size: 240x275mm

Hardcover Book with Printed Cover

112 pages incl 5 Double Fold-out Pages

Content is 170gsm Art Print Semi-Matte Paper

There will be both Color and Black & White photographs

story:
Neither

The view of this faded garden explodes my mind and I get paralyzed, I have no clue how to move two legs, let alone a thousand. - Natasha

Neither is an exploration into the hearts of young women in Kaliningrad. The first generation to have grown up after the collapse of the Soviet Union, they look to define their identity in this small 'island' within Europe. The women I have been living with and sharing with have generously opened up their homes and their minds to allow me to better understand this link between place, identity and history.

This project that has been such a large part of my life over the last few years is now at its final stage. Having changed and grown with the support of many, I finally feel like I'm getting a chance to give a voice to the amazing women that I spent so much time with bringing me into their homes, telling me of their dreams and fears. This book is a dedication to their strength and I hope you will help me realize their stories.

Winner of the Alliance Francaise Photography Prize

All funding will go towards the printing of Neither.

History

Kaliningrad, a Russian enclave, is wedged between Poland, Lithuania and the Baltic Sea. You must cross over 800km and pass through both Lithuania and Belarus to get to 'Big Russia.' It is this geographic isolation of being neither a part of Europe, nor being physically connected to motherland that gives this area its uniqueness. Kaliningrad’s history has been fraught with great transformations from its beginnings. It was once known as Konigsberg, a major city of Prussia, until 1944 when the Red Army invaded and the German and Lithuanian population fled or were killed. Those who live here tell me how, to the rural and the poor of Russia, Stalin proclaimed, 'Come to Konigsberg - choose your home and build your city.' Then came the cold war and with its strategic military position and containing the Baltic Fleet, the region was closed to foreigners and only open to certain eminent Russians. It was not until the collapse of the Soviet Union in 1991 that it re-opened. The independence of Lithuania and Latvia severed Kaliningrad from Russia and has left the region in the fragile position of being an exclave of Russia and an enclave of the EU.

Book

This work became very much a collaborative project as I built close relationships with Natasha, Olga, Jenya, Anastasyia etc. With the need to establish their power within this project, I have worked continuously with the women to edit the work and contribute their texts and ideas. Being able to effectively give a voice to them has always been difficult to realize within the gallery space but needed to be completed within the book form. Over the last six months I have been working with the internationally renowned Dutch designer -SYB- to create the book. Using eyewitness accounts of women who first arrived in Kaliningrad in 1945, and handwritten diary entries of contemporary women, the book works to establish their voices within this project. These personal stories in conjunction with my images, do not seek to answer any questions but rather give a voice to their experiences.

The book starts with an in-bound booklet of eyewitness accounts of women's experiences of first arriving in Kaliningrad in 1945 from 'Big Russia' taken from the Oral History Archive of Kant University, Kaliningrad. We are then brought through contemporary images of the region and the women that now inhabit it with one of the personal handwritten accounts sliced into small parts and printed between the images. The book ends with a final in-bound booklet of the 'diary' entries of the modern women that are shown throughout the book.

Book Specs

Title: Neither

Artist: Kate Nolan

Design: SYB

Publisher: Self-published

Edition Size: 500

Size: 22x22cm

Images: 46

Type of Printing: Offset

Price: €40

Booklet Images

Links to Neither:

Actual Colours May Vary

Prism Photo Magazine

Photographic Museum of Humanity

Foto 8 - Story of the Week

Urbanautica

katenolan.co.uk

Thanks

My biggest thanks goes to Natasha Romankova who is my inspiration in many ways.

Sybren Kuiper- the best designer one could have.

Gavin O'Brien- video and sound editor

The Alps- music

Nadia Gatlva, Svetlana Zabelina and Natasha Romankova- voices

Olga, Evgeniya, Anastasyia, Alissa, Katia, Jevgeni, Anna, Ekaterina and all of the amazing women of Kaliningrad.

story:
Who I am:

• My name is Kyle D. Morris, known as k/d/morris, with over thirty years as a professional photographer, I have been teaching FREE photography lessons to a community of interested individuals for the past four years in exchange for "meals" and it is now to upgrade and update some of my equipment (Canon lenses) that I have had since 1995. With your assistance, I can be up to date with technology and continue to offer my lessons without having to resort to charging anyone. 

• For the record: I have never borrowed or solicited funds from a financial institution, or individuals to reach the level of success and respect as a photographer that I have earned.

I am asking for your help:

• I am seeking funds, totaling $3,000.00 to secure new or used Canon L Series lenses. Most of my participants, have newly purchased cameras, generally of any type and brand, and seek my tutilage and insight to help them learn how to use them and create quality images and to advance in life as respected photographers.

• With new or updated technology, I will be able to properly assist and instruct all of those who I continue to teach and learn from as well, while creating quality images.

• In return for your generosity, I will continue to offer FREE lesson on location or in the privacy of individuals homes, as I do today.

How you can help and the results:

• I not only teach FREE photography lessons, but I have also been teaching free poetry writing and performance classes for almost twenty years, and I love the glow of excitement when one of my students (of all ages) realizes that they "CAN  DO' anything. 

• I am an advocate for teaching people to remove the words "CAN'T and TRY" from their vocabularies and become people with a CAN DO spirit and mentality. I have learned that creative outlets and thinking are the best avenues for such freedom. I have hundreds of people who refer to me as their "teacher" or "mentor' and I humbly accept those titles.


Other Ways You Can Help

 • I appreciate that you took the time to read this and make a contribution to my cause. If you can't make a financial contribution, I am willing to accept new or used "L series" lenses as part of my campaign if possible. 

• I am also willing to accept space to conduct my "indoor lessons" without having to rent studio space or go into private homes.

• Please spread the word and pass this campaign along to your friends and this in need of FREE lessons in the Tri-State area (PA, NJ and DE), and let's build a world of creativity together.

story:
MILANUDES photography book

MILANUDES WAS INSPIRED BY A QUESTION THAT PEOPLE OUTSIDE THE BUSINESS HAVE ALWAYS ASKED ME:

“WHAT ARE MODELS REALLY LIKE  ? "

I’VE HAD THE HONOUR OF PHOTOGRAPHING 50 PROFESSIONAL MODELS, AS NATURE MADE THEM: SPONTANEOUS, LIBERATED AND AUTHENTIC.

MILANUDES WILL BE A ONE HUNDRED AND FIFTY - IMAGE HARDBOUND BOOK, PRINTED ON  QUALITY PAPER.

THESE PHOTOGRAPHS ARE A REPRESENTATION OF WHAT MODELS REALLY ARE, WITHOUT PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP, HAIR STYLING OR FANCY CLOTHES.

MY GOAL IS TO PRODUCE ONE THOUSAND COPIES OF THE BOOK, AND TO HOLD EXHIBITIONS IN VARIOUS CITIES AROUND THE WORLD.

I VERY MUCH HOPE YOU WILL ALL SUPPORT ME IN THIS PROJECT



MILANUDES libro di fotografie  

  

MILANUDES  E’ ISPIRATO DA UNA TIPICA DOMANDA DI CHI NON LAVORA NELLA MODA:   "COME SONO REALMENTE LE MODELLE? "  

HO AVUTO L'ONORE DI FOTOGRAFARE 50 MODELLE/I PROFESSIONISTI  , COME NATURA LI HA FATTI:  SPONTANEI , LIBERI E AUTENTICI .  

MILANUDES E’ UN LIBRO DI  CENTOCINQUANTA  FOTOGRAFIE CON COPERTINA RIGIDA, STAMPATO SU CARTA  DI QUALITÀ.  

IL MIO OBIETTIVO È QUELLO DI STAMPARE MILLE COPIE DEL LIBRO ,

E DI FARE MOSTRE IN VARIE CITTA ' NEL MONDO .  

GRAZIE PER IL SUPPORTO.
